notes: ◎光電二三四及電資外生班合開，專業四選二B

description.zh: (1)分波多工系統簡介(2)SBS效應(3)EDFA(光放大器)原理與特性(4)EDFA增益等化(5)DWDM MUX/DeMUX(6)光信號非線性效益(7)類比分波多工系統(8)數位分波多工系統
description.en: (1)Introduction (2)Stimulated Brillouin Scattering (3)EDFA principles (4)EDFA gain flattening (5)DWDM MUX/DeMUX (6)Nonlinear effect (7)analog WDM (8)Digital WDM

description.zh: (1)光纖電纜混合系統(2)個人通訊系統(3)光纖電話系統(4)光纖電纜混合電話系統(5)有線電視固網DWDM系統(6)信號間非線性作用(7)類比數位通道的干擾(8)脈衝雜訊
description.en: (1)Wire Access in HFC Systems (2)Personal Communication Systems (3)Optical Fiber-Based Phone Systems (4)Hybrid-Fiber-Coax BAsed Phone Systems (5)A Hybrid DWDM System for CATC & Fixed Network System (6)Nonlinear Interaction Between Optical Signaals (7)Crosstalk From Analoy Channels to Digital Channel (8)Clipping-Induced Impulse Noise

name.zh: 光纖有線電視固網信號傳輸系統
name.en: Fiber system for CATV, fixed network

description.zh: 繞射光學是基於光波繞射的原理，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、此類的微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：1.光學繞射原理2.傅式光學3.繞射光學元件之設計方法4.繞射光學元件之應用5.繞射光學元件之實現與製作
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the principle of diffraction of optical wave and study the means of using the diffraction to perform optical setups in modern optical systems. Diffractive optical element (DOE) can be applied to correct aberrations, light focusing, light splitting, and other novel functions that traditional optical components difficultly or impossibly perform. DOE plays an important role in modern optical technology. The content of this course includes: 1. Principle of optical diffraction, 2. Fourier optics, 3. Design methods of DOE, 4. Applications of DOEs, and 5. Implementation of DOEs.

name.zh: 繞射光學原理與應用含實習
name.en: Theory and Application of Diffractive Optics with Lab practice

description.zh: 高階光學鏡頭是目前探索太空、發展醫療及曝光設備極為重要的關鍵技術，此技術可應用到生活各項領域，包括：拍照攝影、星空宇宙探索、智慧監控及商用鏡頭(望遠鏡、相機和顯微鏡)等。本課程主要授課內容針對工程背景學生跨領域選修，以瞭解奈米級精度系統設計、製造、檢測、組裝及驗證。為使學習效果顯著成效，除了以講授方式闡述重要基礎觀念外，選修學生將實際製作產品及最終上台報告，使課程學以致用為本課程最大宗旨。
description.en: High-end optical lenses are leading edge technology for the medicine, semiconductor, mobile phone, surveillance, machine vision, and space industry. This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them. All the selected students in this course are required to report their results on the stage in the final examination.

name.zh: 光機電系統概論與實務製造
name.en: Introduction to optical electromechanical system and manufacturing technology

notes: ◎光電三四研及電資外生三合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 生化碩;合併博班生化組專討上課

description.zh: 每週三小時一學分的專業必修課，旨在教導碩一新生學習各種生化工程相關的實驗原理與操作技術，以增進學生在未來進行生化實驗研究的知識與技巧；此外，課程中安排工廠參觀實習，結合學術與產業，豐富學生視野，促進學生對產業界的瞭解。
description.en: The three-hour per week course is designed to teach the 1st year graduate students a variety of biochemical engineering principles and hands-on skills to strengthen their knowledge and skills of the field; The course comes with 1-2 visits to industrial plants to further enrich the students' understanding of the industrial process.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）；結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms. In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生懂得基本的微生物學外，更將引導學生練習閱讀一些國外期刊的最新研究，內容包括：微生物分子遺傳、微生物免疫、微生物生理及微生物與藥物等知識。
description.en: This course will let students to learn basic microbiology; furthermore, will introduce students to learn how to read SCI journals and new knowledge in microbiology. It contains molecular genetics of microorganisms, immunology of microorganisms, physiology of microorganisms and the relationships between microorganisms and drugs.

description.zh: 課程上設計了兩大部分　　一為生物技術產業概論-基礎；另一為生物技術產業概論-進階。　　基礎部分以分析化學為切入點，再進入蛋白質與酵素之生化領域，再擴展到各種大小分子的整合應用，最後引進細胞與組織工程的建構；接下來再以各重要特化領域，進行分項介紹，包含特用化學品、食品科學、醫療藥品與植物科學，期待學員們能確時掌握各項領域之技術與應用。　　進階部分以最具發展潛力之生物工業、植物食品、生物晶片、基因體學、蛋白質體學、幹細胞為六大標的，各分為Part A：介紹各產業中相對應用之相關生物技術；Part B：針對各型產業之市場進行介紹與討論；Part C：進行生物技術產業案例之專題討論，務求學員由實務中得到知識也獲取寶貴經驗，以面對迷人又深具挑戰的生物科技產業。
description.en: The course is divided into two sections: (1) Fundamental of industry of biotechnology and (2) Advance of industry of biotechnology.Section (1) gives a general introduction from the aspect of analytical chemistry that covers protein chemistry and enzymology, micro- and macromolecule, tissue engineering, fine chemicals, food science, pharmaceutical and botanical sciences. Section (2) covers topics on bioindustry, nutritional science, bio-chip development, proteomics, protein science and stem cell research, in which the content is divided into three subparts namely, Part A An overview of technologies used in each topic; Part B An introduction to markets and trends; Part C Case study. We hope all participants will gain insight on today's biotechnology and get ready to meet future challenges.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 化工碩;合併博班化工組專討上課

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

notes: 預選限30人(碩班);化工三四和化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是提升學生的科技英文技能和協助他們進階職場的實用英語需求. 此課程著重於科技英語之閱讀、聽力、口語、寫作、理解、語法規則、詞彙,發音,對話,商務溝通,和專業演講技巧. 本課程包括撰寫履歷, 面試技巧, 軟技能如溝通技巧, 職場禮節; email及電話技巧,出差英語, 判斷力,了解國際科技職場環境及工作需求,專業項目策劃及執行.輔導學生如何展現自己優勢及作好個人職業規劃,從而順利邁向成功目標.
description.en: This course aims to educate students in Information Technology English and prepare students for their career advancement. This course focuses on IT science and technology English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary, pronunciation, conversation, communication, and professional presentation skills. This course also covers soft skills such as interview tips, communication, business etiquette, travel English, email English, decision making, understanding international business, global working environment, project management planning and execution. In addition, this course offers personal development for students to discover their personal advantage and perform their career planning for achieving career goals.

description.zh: 本課程說明程序最適化的基本原理，介紹化工程序及能源系統中常見的最適化策略。內容包括：最適化理論及演算法、數學規劃與建模技巧、最適化於化工問題及能源議題之應用。
description.en: This course aims to introduce optimisation basics and common optimisation strategies in chemical processes and energy systems. The contents include optimisation theory and algorithms, mathematical programming and modelling techniques, and applications to chemical engineering problems and energy issues.

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象( Global Warming )，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

description.zh: 本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

name.en: Management of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property

notes: 化工大四、化工所和創創專區合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於按照熱力學和原子機構的基本理論來解釋一些新發展，並以此來討論相變化的問題。內容有相變化之熱力學和擴散學理論，液相－固相及固相－固相相變化之討論。
description.en: The objective of this course to present a treatment of phase transformations in which these and other new developments could be explained in terms of the basic principles of thermodynamics and atomic mechanisms。The contents introduce thermodynamics and diffusion theories of phase transformations，and deal with liquid－solid phase transformations，solid－solid phase transformations。

description.zh: 一、張量分析(Tensor  analysis)二、熱性質(Thermal properties)三、電性質(Electrical  Properties)四、介電性質(Dielectric  Properties)五、磁性質(Magnetic  Properties)六、 光學性質(Optical  Properties)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Physical properties of Material.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹各種金屬表面被覆之基本原理，特性測試及其工程上之應用。內容有擴散被覆、PVD、CVD、電鍍及陽極處理等方法；基本真空技術，被覆層特性，以及表面被覆層之應用。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles of metals surface coating，properties test and its engineering applications.The contents include Diffusion Coatings、PVD、CVD、Electroplatings and Anodic Coatings treatment；Elementary Vacuum Technologies，coating layer properties and its applications.

description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

description.zh: 本課程探討電子材料性質、固態物理基礎、元件物理等相關內容，強化電子材料與半導體元件技術之關聯性，藉由剖析材料結構與元件電性，深入探討電子元件在實際應用時可能遭遇之材料議題。本課程將介紹多種半導體元件技術應用，內容包括p-n接面、發光二極體與太陽能電池等。
description.en: This course will introduce the material properties, the basics of solid-state physics, and semiconductor devices and physics to provide knowledge of electronic materials and modern semiconductor devices. To assess the material and device issues of electronics for practical use, analysis of the material structure and electrical performance are essential. The content will include various semiconductor device technologies, such as p-n junction, light emitted diodes (LEDs), and solar cells.

name.zh: 電子材料與元件技術特論
name.en: Special Topics in Electronic Materials and Devices

description.zh: 本「材料分析」課程主要建構於晶體繞射學、顯微術、光譜學三大基礎原理，旨在闡釋固態材料內部與表面的晶體結構、顯微結構和化學成分之分析技術。現代科技探究精密、準確與高解析度，本課程逐步精要剖析X光繞射儀、各式光學和電子顯微鏡、掃描探針顯微鏡、歐傑電子能譜儀、二次離子質譜儀、核磁共振波譜儀、各式光譜儀，以及其他如熱分析、同步輻射與中子分析等分析儀器，特別應用案例解析與討論，以增進對先進新穎材料的認識，使學生得以了解並深入各種常見材料分析的原理、方法及其應用。
description.en: This "characterization of materials" course is mainly based on three fundamental principles of crystal diffractometry, microscopy and spectroscopy; and aims to illustrate the characterization techniques of crystal structure, microstructure and chemical composition inside and on the surface of solid materials. Exploring precision, accuracy and high resolution of modern science and technology, this course gradually analyzes X-ray diffractometer, various optical and electron microscopy, scanning probe microscope, AES, XPS, SIMS, NMR, all kinds of spectrometers, as well as other analytical instruments such as thermal analysis, synchrotron radiation and neutron analyses. Special application case study and discussion are provided to enhance the understanding of advanced and novel materials, so that students can know well and fully utilize a variety of important materials analysis technique and their principles, methodology and proper applications.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

notes: 碩一修習,材資館演講廳

description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括：(1)岩石材料與岩體的工程意義、(2)岩石應力與應變的關係與工程意義、(3) 岩石變形性與強度的工程意義(4)如何辨識不穩定邊坡(5)如何辨識不穩定隧道(6)岩石工程設計理念(7)案例研究等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [II] consist of (1) Rock Material and Rock Mass (2)Stress and Stength (3)Deformability and Stength (4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope  (5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel (6)Rock Engineering Design (7) Engineering Case Studies.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 本課程專門設置了兩個主要的構面，課程規劃著重於培育未來之企業領導與管理人才與而設置。全球化的競爭使得各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，高階主管面臨"兩難" 甚至"多難"的多元選擇情況下，企業目標與經濟決策時常產生衝突，”倫理”的議題因此成為當今高階管理之重要課題之一！ 再者，本課程第二個構面為策略管理，透過教導策略目標的擬定、執行、組織結構以及如何因應組織內外部環境的轉變能帶給IMBA課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，同時，配合個案，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與併購和多角化議題等方面相關管理能力之建構。
description.en: More than ever, business leaders are facing even more challenges in the turbulence environment, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects. Two important parts are introduced in IMBA program, which is business ethics and strategic management. The purpose in this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains. How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. Moreover, the topic in strategic management integrates cutting-edge research on topics including competitive advantage, corporate governance, diversification, strategic leadership, technology and innovation, and corporate social responsibility through both theory and case studies. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the st

description.zh: 本課程討論利用統計方法進行品質管制，品管方法將運用於市場、設計、採購、生產與檢測。此外，並介紹如何利用全面品管建立並維持高效率之企業組織，以六標準差技術改善產品開發、製造與服務。
description.en: This course provides a fundamental understanding of statistical quality control concept. Areas for quality implementation will include functions such as marketing, design, purchasing, production, inspection, etc. This class also enables the students to recognize the foundation to create and sustain an effective organization through total quality management. Finally, the class provides comprehensive focus on six sigma that has been found to improve product, service and process.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis. St

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.

description.zh: 自21世紀的資通訊（ICT)產業的興起，跟隨著物聯網（IoT)和大數據(Big Data)分析與運用時代來臨。我們將共同探討：由產業發展趨勢，產品創新設計與研發，到產業行銷，應用，與管理的關鍵要素，以符合工業4.0趨勢。
description.en: In the twenty first century, innovation is the key factor which brings profits to our technological stagnation.  However, without the right strategy with some killer-tactics implemented, the innovation may turn good things up side down. This course, Product Innovation Strategy, is given from a practitioner’s viewpoint on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, and experiences related to information and communication industry (ICT), Big Data (BDA) and Internet of Things (IoT). We will study, review, and design new product project to help the students develop capabilities on ICT new product development and project management in order to reach the market trends and demands for the Ubiquitous Computing technology on the 3rd Platform era.

description.zh: 本創新課程主要專為本校管理學院之國際學生而規劃, 為了培養      本院畢業之國際管理碩士IMBA學生, 運用其跨文化之多元優勢, 與在本管理學院受多元學門之培育, 未來能成為跨國產業界之優秀領導者, 貢獻人群。透過動態激盪之個案研討, 與實戰模擬, 學生們將能啟動其創造力, 學習開發與創新思維, 進而建立其創造性思考, 分析邏輯之架構, 與實務界問題解決之道之整合管理能力。學生們亦將學習多元化之企業主題, 包括有跨文化之商業交涉與溝通協商, 創意之行銷策略, 創業家精神,  組織發展與團隊管理, 領導學等實務模擬。經過整套課程之培育, 透過哈佛管理個案與跨文化相關產業之分析與研討, 期許IMBA國際學生們將建立實際應用到未來之職涯規劃與機會開展之學識, 技術與能力, 並本著具有仁愛, 與誠信正直之寬廣胸懷, 進而成為未來之優秀領導人。
description.en: This course is specifically designed for our International MBA studentswho have the heart of passion and willingness to become great leaders after graduation for their future career.  Through dynamic brain-power training, knowledge and intelligence building, case study and international simulations, we will activate the creative genes in each one of our IMBA students.  We will build their creative thinking, analytical reasoning, and problem solving abilities.  In the spirit of inspirational leadership, we will develop their creative marketing, managerial and organizational skills in the process of entrepreneurial case study and simulations.  Students will be able to draw upon their cross-cultural knowledge and learn how to apply what they have learnt in our business schools.  The main topics to be covered include cross-cultural business etiquettes, creative designing, innovative marketing, cross-cultural communication, analytical planning, cross-cultural negotiation, risk-taking, and

name.zh: 跨文化創造力與創業家策略

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

description.zh: 本課程為ㄧ跨文化、跨領域及跨國界的實務導向課程。課程結構涵蓋二個主軸：(1)透過分組討論議題與任務指派，學習團隊合作，從領導力到團隊成員之間的溝通，確認每個成員的角色定位，建立高績效團隊；(2)透過宏觀的金融分析以及時事的案例研討，判斷國際市場趨勢，並透過市場上真實的投資工具模擬，逐步帶領學生從基本面、技術面進行國際市場的行情分析以及個人的風險控管。
description.en: This course is a practical international Economic course.There are two main parts of the lecture.The first one is team building, you will learn how to divide the work and communicate effectively.The second part is learning by doing. The teacher will analysis the trend of the international market by macroeconomics. Moreover, teaching students using technical and fundamental analysis to predict the market. Most important of all, let students use the online application to imitate the real trading world.

description.zh: 網路行銷包含資訊技術與行銷觀念，這門課希望融合者兩面的觀點，在使同學了解網路行銷的理論與實務，輔以資料分析之技術，介紹目前常用的推薦系統、客戶分群等行銷資料分析，此外，也輔以期刊論文的研讀來加強同學的學術理論基礎。
description.en: E-Marketing involves information technology and marketing. The course will explore information technology/systems concepts from a non-technical perspective and examine how the marketing function is influenced by emerging technology trends. In addition, some famous e-marketing technique would be introduced in this course including recommender system, customer segmentation and so on.  This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical bases

description.zh: 一個數據模式是可以用來解釋結構性資料在商業環境下所代表的意義，而數據模組的建立，則是現實世界知訊管理系統中的自然而然產生的普遍結果。上述共同構成了我們當今被稱為數據分析系統，此系統是一種管理工具，提供用於評估及製定決策。本課程旨在介紹基礎數據模組的工具和使用方法以及相關主題，並會包含與強調在商業上的應用，其重點在不確定性模組建立與評估，理解決策的本質，有效利用數據和有限的信息來模擬複雜系統以及優化分配資源。
description.en: A data model describes how structured data is represented in a business environment. Data modeling is a natural consequence of the prevalence of management information systems in the real world. Together they form what in our days has become known as a Data Analytics system that provides management tools to evaluate performance and make decisions. The course aims to introduce the fundamentals of data models tools and methods and related topics. Business applications of the topics covered will be highlighted. The emphasis will be on modeling and evaluating uncertainty, understanding the nature of decision-making, using data and limited information efficiently simulating complex systems, and optimally allocating resources.

name.en: Analysis and Decision Making Using Data

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

description.zh: 請參閱英文說明。
description.en: This is a research-based course. The course covers international IP treaties, IP-related provisions in some free trade agreements, and judicial decisions related to those international IP treaties. Eight research topics will be assigned to the participating students. The research-based course includes:--Module One: International law 101--Module Two: IP treaties; IP provisions in FTAs--Module Three: Case law--Module Four: In-depth studies請參閱英文說明。

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1.專利權利項解讀 2.專利侵權分析流程 3.專利迴避設計要件 4.專利策略分析 5.專利佈局實務 6.案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

name.zh: 專利佈局與專利策略專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Portfolio and Patent Strategy

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論之後專利答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in class.

name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

notes: 適研一修，與電機系合開

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略:案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題(二)
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence(II)

description.zh: 電腦科技進步帶動文創設計發展一日千里。行銷生態也因應時代及市場趨勢多所變化。本課程著重於專案製作與創意發展共同開發文創設計。並藉由個案的探討與分析、實案的演練，使學員在不斷變化的行銷市場上，掌握網路行銷的特性，加以應用與推廣文創設計。
description.en: Computer science and technology rapid development driven by cultural and creative design. Ecological marketing era and also in response to market trends more than change. This course focuses on the production and creative development of the project to develop cultural and creative design. And by case discussion and analysis, real case exercises, so that students in the ever-changing market marketing master Internet marketing features to the application and promotion of cultural and creative design.

name.zh: 網路行銷與文創設計研究
name.en: Internet Marketing and Cultural & Creative Design

description.zh: 本課程探討產業發展歷程中，產業文化資產的出現、保存與再利用等課題。透過文獻研讀、議題討論、國內外個案研討、實地參訪、參與學術研討會、作業報告等方式，學習三課題：1.產業發展歷程中文化資產的出現、保存與再利用；2.我國產業文化資產清查保存與再生計畫之核心主軸；3.民間運用產業文化資產開發新事業。
description.en: This course explores the issues of the appearance, preservation and reuse of industrial Cultural Heritage in the process of industrial development. Through the literature study, discussion topics, domestic and foreign case studies, field visits, participation in academic seminars, job reports, etc., to learn 3 topics ：1.The issues of the appearance, preservation and reuse of industrial ccultural heritage in the process of industrial development , 2. The core spindle of Taiwan's Government industrial heritage inventory preservation and regeneration plan, 3. Private sector utilize industrial ccultural heritage to develop new businesses.

name.zh: 產業發展與文化資產專題

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 本課程探究文化保存的各項議題，包含有形無形文化保存的真實性、文化價值的差異與認定、詮釋與再現；同時透過國內外文化保存的實踐案例的分析與討論，思考未來文化保存的多元發展可能性。
description.en: This course aims to understand the concept of cultural preservation, and the methods of doing cultural preservation by examining different case studies in the world. Different issues related to cultural preservation are also discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of cultural heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. A creative practice of cultural preservation will be conducted in this course.

description.zh: 物質文化是人們生活內容的反映留存，也是族群精神信息的窗口。對於文物的品賞鑒定，在針對料、工、型、紋等面向作周全的觀察賞玩中，斷代與辨偽的素養至關緊要。古玉以其珍稀價昂，仿製現象由來久遠，其用力之深，在諸文物項類中，向以精微著稱，因此，據以為文物鑑賞之入門，深刻而切用。本課程即以中國玉器賞鑒要領及收藏心法為授課主軸，會同業師強化陶瓷老件、宗教古畫以及中國三大硬木傢俱的品鑑，並旁涉香學、茶藝道具、衣飾刺繡等雜項組合，令學子在今後品賞現代工藝、創設經紀文創商品間，對於「老味」的韻致，初步養成較高辨識與感受能力，在「新」與「善」的功用考量中，涵詠著「真」與「美」的另類素養。
description.en: Material culture is a reflection of the content of people's lives, and it is also a window for the spiritual information of ethnic groups.For Cultural relics appraisal, in the comprehensive observation and appreciation of materials, crafts, patterns etc.False literacy is crucial. Ancient jade is rare and expensive. Its imitation phenomenon has a long history.Among the various cultural relic items, Xiang is famous for its subtlety. Therefore, it is believed that the entry to the appreciation of cultural relics is profound and useful.This course is based on Chinese jade appreciation and collection methods as the main axis of teaching.Including old ceramics and miscellaneous items such as China's three major hardwoods, clothing and embroidery, make students appreciate modern art,The training room for the creation of brokerage cultural and creative products has initially developed a high level of recognition and feeling for the charm of "old flavor". Among the "good" uses, it has the "au

description.zh: 使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。本課程將介紹：1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理 2、企業與客戶間的客戶倫理 3、企業與同業間的競爭倫理 4、企業與股東間的股東倫理 5、企業與社會間的社會責任 6、企業與政府間的政商倫理。
description.en: Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 1. Ethics between employer and employee 2. Ethics between enterprise and client 3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor 4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder 5. Ethics between enterprise and society 6. Ethics between enterprise and government.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1.知識發現與資料探勘概論 2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3.資料處理技術 4.教導型學習方法 5.教導型學習方法 6.關聯法則探勘 7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹計算智慧的相關知識、技術與其優點，旨在教授學生如何運用計算智慧技術解決實際問題。課程目標有二：(1)相關的計算智慧技術與其運作原理，包含：遺傳演算法、多目標遺傳演算法等；(2)相關的應用案例討論。透過此課程，學生將可套用計算智慧技術於各種最佳化問題。
description.en: This course will introduce related knowledge, techniques and merits of computational intelligence for providing useful ways for students to solve the real application problems. The goals of this course include two parts: (1) related computational intelligence techniques and how it work, including genetic algorithms, multi-objective genetic algorithm, etc; (2) related applications and discussions. Through this course, students can learn how to apply computational intelligence on different optimization problems.

notes: ◎科研243教室，資財所和管理博班合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and approaches, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

notes: 請排六教526(e),限本系生,修課上限27人

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by wo

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (II)

notes: 請排二教103,限本系生,修課上限27人，課程配合USR計畫

description.zh: 有鑒於國內的教育制度主張男女擁有平等的權利，但實際結果卻是女學生在理工科系方面成為少數族群，本課程以增進女性參與人機互動為主要目標，結合一連串的研習營教學與展示技術的引入，教導有關互動科技技術等相關應用，並透過了解性別研究的主要流派與其理論，來確認性別研究與互動設計的性質與功能，期待學生能再了解性別研究的主要理論後，能把它應用於互動設計以及創意發想上，以因應未來女性經濟力的快速掘起。
description.en: The education system of Taiwan claims that men and women are equal. The truth is that female students are only a minority of the department of the science and engineering, not to mention the percentage of the further education in this field. Based on this concept, we plan the interactive curriculum. We will go to give instruction about the interactive technology. In order to test the spot reaction and track the reaction after the exhibition when the exhibition is ongoing, we will apply Radio-frequency identification. The outdoor education and the indoor education; the two complement each other and expecting this exhibition to encourage more female students to discovery the science and have better achievements in this field.

notes: 限15人修課，課程配合USR計畫

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 請排PBL教室,限20人,日碩&設計博&資工所合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹資訊視覺化設計與應用的原理與基礎。課程內容將包括:a)	資訊圖像及數位視覺的深入探討b)	利用電腦程式語言製作分析圖表、空間地圖及介面設計。c)	故事與應用主題的視覺化設計在本課程中，學生將學習如何有效的將資訊轉化為具視覺化美感的圖像，並從不同的案例分析中學會如何評估資訊視覺化設計作品與應用。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and basic of infographic design and application. It consists of following issues:a)	The deep study of information graphics and digital visualizations.b)	The use of computer program language to create charts, maps and user interface.c)	The illustrations design to tell stories and application implementation. In this course, you will learn to create effective and beautiful graphical displays of evidence, and to critically evaluate examples from case studies.

name.zh: 資訊視覺化設計與應用

notes: 請排進修部教室,日職碩合開

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面以感知真實的角度循序討論數位呈現應用於設計的相關技術。在研究理論方面則介紹相關之現有研究，研究工具，與研究方法，並討論與人互動之設計領域研究的理論與操作，心理物理學的實驗設計，與受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: Technologically, this course introduces the recent developments on digital representations and their applications on design. Theoretically, this course reviews the theories and methodologies of the research applications in the field of design that involves human interaction.

notes: 請排光華409室,限12人,日職合開,限論文研究組修

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中與人的認知行為相關之心智活動知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之認知科學基礎並加以應用，使介面之設計符合使用者的認知需求並具備使用上的效率與舒適度。課程內容包含認知心理學概論、認知心理與介面設計、腦神經認知、感覺訊號的知覺、注意力、記憶力、心智圖象、認知發展、問題解決、創造力以及認知與行為績效等。教學將以課堂講授以及學生分組討論與發表為主要方式，並以報告撰寫以及分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of recognition for interactive design. Students can understand the recognition knowledge and apply it to interactive design, which can meet user recognition requirements and be equipped with efficiency and effectiveness. The contents include recognition introduction, brain nerve recognition, sensor recognition, attention, memory, mental map, recognition development, problem-solution, creative ability and behavior performance. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, group discussion and presentation, and evaluated by student's reports and oral presentation.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.

notes: ◎機電科博和機械自動化、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 本課程專門設置了兩個主要的構面，課程規劃著重於培育未來之企業領導與管理人才與而設置。全球化的競爭使得各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，高階主管面臨"兩難" 甚至"多難"的多元選擇情況下，企業目標與經濟決策時常產生衝突，”倫理”的議題因此成為當今高階管理之重要課題之一！ 再者，本課程第二個構面為策略管理，透過教導策略目標的擬定、執行、組織結構以及如何因應組織內外部環境的轉變能帶給IMBA課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，同時，配合個案，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與併購和多角化議題等方面相關管理能力之建構。
description.en: More than ever, business leaders are facing even more challenges in the turbulence environment, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects. Two important parts are introduced in IMBA program, which is business ethics and strategic management. The purpose in this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains. How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. Moreover, the topic in strategic management integrates cutting-edge research on topics including competitive advantage, corporate governance, diversification, strategic leadership, technology and innovation, and corporate social responsibility through both theory and case studies. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the st

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis. St

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by wo

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 介紹高動態範圍影像相關技術與理論基礎，包含高動態範圍攝影，物理運算彩現，色調映射，影像光源等數位軟硬體操作。並透過討論引導學生如何在高動態範圍影像技術所建立的數位環境中，發展設計與研究的應用。
description.en: Technologically, this course introduces the related digital technologies of High Dynamic Range Imaging. Including High Dynamic Range Photography, Physically Based Rendering, Tone mapping, and Image Based Lighting. Intellectually, this course aims to explore the possibilities of utilizing the related technologies of High Dynamic Range Imaging on design and research applications.

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面以感知真實的角度循序討論數位呈現的相關技術。在研究理論方面則介紹相關之現有研究、研究工具、與研究方法，並討論與人互動之感知研究的理論與操作，心理物理學的實驗設計與受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: This course introduces research methods applicable in the field of design with particular emphasize on the human interaction. Topics including Psychophysics, perceptual study, HCI experiment design, hypothesis testing, and statistical analysis. The aim of this course is to help students in identifying a research topic in the field of interaction design, designing an experiment, and preparing the necessary documents including research proposal and consent form to recruit human subjects to participate in the experiment.

notes: ◎請排光華409室,限12人,日碩&外碩&設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: ◎機電科博和機械自動化、能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解行銷管理的概念與理論，建立行銷管理以增加市場優勢。課程主要內容包括：行銷思想、行銷策略、行銷元素、總體行銷與電商行銷。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish concepts and theory ofMarketing Management . Topics are as follows: Marketing Thought, Marketing Strategy, Marketing Elements, Macro Marketing and Online.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing. In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博一，請依分組&共同討論上課時間

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二.家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三.醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四.日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 日、職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程藉由優質學術論文內容的解析，協助研究生學習並改進學術論文寫作的技巧，經由實作增強投稿發表的能力。內容涵蓋學術論文主題的精選，研究問題的界定，文獻回顧的深入，論文結構的建立與文字的鋪陳，研究發現的討論與結論的撰寫，針對論文完成後投稿的步驟及審查意見的回覆等均以實例進行探討。
description.en: The course helps PhD students to practice and improve their writing skills for academic purposes. The key components of the course focuses on the discussion of some selected papers from high quality journal articles to absorb their writing and presenting skills. Hence, the students can have better opportunities to produce satisfied academic articles to meet the requirements for publication and degree dissertation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討如何整合科技於文化創意產業，透過案例教學，幫助學生結合有效率的資訊科技工具於人文藝術，以發展文化創意產業，並創造高附加價值的效益。當今產、官、學、研都強調跨域整合的重要性，文創與互動科技的結合，能為文化創意作加值，並注入新生命、新體驗，因此，文創遇到科技後，所激盪出的火花與創意，已逐漸受到產、學界的青睞。本課程將探討文化創意的發展脈絡、文創的底蘊與其應用面、互動科技的應用，透過文獻研讀、案例分析等方式，瞭解國外最新研究與趨勢，討論文創與科技的創新應用可行性，引領文化創意產業轉型，規劃未來文創與科技整合的新契機。
description.en: The course intends to explore about how to integrate the technology into the cultural and creative Industries. Through case study, it will help students to combine efficient information technology tools in the field of arts and humanities, and also facilitate the development of cultural and creative industries, and create high value-added benefits for these industries. Today's industry, government, academia, research has emphasized the importance of cross-discipline consolidation. It means that cultural creation and interactive technology combined with value-added as a bonus for the cultural creation, and implant new life, new experiences. Therefore, when the cultural creation encounter technology, which bring out the spark and creativity, has gradually been favored both with industry  and academia. This course will explore the cultural creative context, cultural inside information and its application, the interactive technology application by using the method of literature review, cas

name.en: Special Integration Topics on Technology in Cultural and Creative Industry

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 光電化學即利用太陽光能源或其他光源驅使一個完整的電化學氧化還原反應，並充分使用光電催化反應後產生的電子轉換為電力，即為太陽能電池，其中有機材料、無機材料與電解質為太陽光電池反應時主要的影響因素。本課程將會介紹光電化學原理與測定, 光電催化, 光電化學能轉移及儲存,不同材料發展出不同型態的太陽能電池，進而介紹光電化學如何應用於染料敏化太陽能電池。
description.en: The concept of photoelectrochemistry is to utilize the solar energy and other light sources to drive a complete electrochemical oxidation-reduction reaction where the photocatalytic electron reaction has been converted into electrical energy. Photovoltaic cells which also known as solar cells composed of organic and inorganic materials and electrolytes are the great example for the photoelectrochemical reactions. Here the proposed course is constructed to introduce and implement the basic photoelectrochemical principles, measurements, photoelectrocatalysis, photoelectrical charge transfer and the storage of chemical energy. Further the remaining section of this course will be focused on the detailed studies about the development of different inorganic, organic materials for the fabrication of dye-sensitized solar cells.

description.zh: 本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。     奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
description.en: This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

description.zh: 介紹VBA 語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of EXCEL VBA language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 材料『機械行為』也稱『固體行為』。為有效選用固體材料（包括金屬、陶瓷、高分子）在機械及結構上可負載目標荷重及應力，並防止斷裂，確保安全。有賴從固體彈性變形，應力應變流體模型，合應力屈服強度，塑性變形模型，應力疲勞，應變疲勞、缺口疲勞、破壞力學觀念、裂紋成長、高溫潛變及減緩振動等逐項學習。介紹各種材料機械性質的基礎知識及各種機械性質的原理.
description.en: The mechanical behavior of material is also called solid behavior.In order to selecta solid material(including metal, ceramics and polymer) which is able to bear the objective load and stress at the mechanics and structure, and to prevent rupture for safety. It depends on the elastic deformation of solid, the fluid model of stress strain, the yield strength of synthetic stress, plastic deformation model, stress fatigue, strain fatigue, cleavage fatigue, destructive dynamics, crack growth, high temperature creep and alleviate vibration to learn the subject. It also introduces all kinds of fundamental knowledge and theory of material mechanic property.

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 固態元件簡介,功能電子陶瓷(functional ceramics); 同時可對某些物理量如壓 ,力,音, 濕度, 溫度, 氣體等產生響應, 故其亦可稱為感測陶瓷(sensing ceramics). 精密電子陶瓷課程內容將對日常生活常見之介電陶瓷, 壓電陶瓷, 焦電陶瓷, 半導體陶瓷及磁性陶瓷等部分作深入淺出介紹.
description.en: It may also be called as Solid-state Devices and "functional ceramics" because of the special function applied in practical circuits; through the responses caused by pressure, force, sound, moisture, temperature and different gas, the fine electronic ceramics may also be called "sensing ceramics". In this course, the dielectric ceramics, piezoelectric ceramics, pyroelectric ceramics, semiconducting ceramics and magnetic ceramics will be introduced with their applications.

description.zh: 隨著先進能源科技的快速進展，各種形態能源的生產、儲存、再生、與利用成為技術發展的重點。材料科技是提升能源效率的重要一環，本課程結合包括金屬、陶瓷、高分子、奈米等複合材料系統，討論材料在在包括儲氫合金、二次電池、燃料電池、太陽能電池、熱電、超電容等新型能源儲存或生產等裝置上的應用領域與其限制。
description.en: The demands for advanced energy requires the development of technologies for sustainable energy production, converting, and storage. Materials are key blocks to improved performance in new energy technologies. These new materials systems often combine the knowledge in the fields of metals, ceramics, polymer, and nano-materials. This course will discuss the applications and limits of materials in hydrogen storage, secondary batteries, fuel cells, solar cells, thermoelectric devices, and supercapacitors to give undergraduate students a basic understanding of energy-related materials.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 課程內容包含薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 介紹晶體的各種完美結構，缺陷結構的形成與各種物理特性的相互關係，電子的波動與粒子之性質，電子於自由電子能量井，固態中行為與能帶觀念之介紹，固態材料的鬆散行為，固態的介電性質。
description.en: An introduction to Solid-State Physics in materials science.

description.zh: 電化學工程特論的領域眾多，舉凡腐蝕現象與電泳作用的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了介紹基本的電化學原理外，另將著重於電化學分析方法在能源與生醫系統研究上的應用。
description.en: Special topics in the field of electrochemistry include many different phenomena (e.g., corrosion and electrophoresis, electro analytical sensors and batteries devices, and the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine technologies……). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electro-analytical methods to the study of energy and biomedical systems.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括：Android作業系統概觀、Java程式設計簡介、Android SDK應用程式開發環境與模擬器建置、Android專案建立與結構、Activity元件、使用者介面設計與使用XML的方式、View與Layout、Widget與使用者事件處理方法、Dialogs、Adapter與AdapterView、WebView、儲存媒介元件、多媒體撥放器元件、定位系統元件、Google Maps、加速感測器元件等等。
description.en: The topics included in this course will include: Android operating system overview, A brief introduction of Java, Android SDK development environment setup and the emulator, Android project creation, Activity, User interface design and XML, View and layout, Widget and event handling, Dialogs, Adapter and AdapterView, Webview, Storage, Mediaplayer, GPS, Google Maps, G-sensor, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹物件導向設計原則以及軟體設計樣式技術。課程涵蓋的內容包括：軟體設計與設計樣式重要基礎概念以及生成、結構、行為三類設計樣式。探討在系統需求與需求規格之後，藉由物件導向結構設計與適當的選擇以發展系統，並運用設計樣式重構軟體系統的邏輯結構，以改進軟體設計。透過使用UML和Java實際開發軟體系統，學習者將有充分機會練習設計樣式之使用。
description.en: This course discusses issues in principles of object-oriented design through design patterns, as listed below. Important general ideas on design and design patterns; creational, structural and behavioral design patterns. A study of the selection of appropriate object-oriented structure after the systems requirements or requirements specification of the software system has been developed. To improve design, design patterns are created in the logic view of a software system. Learners will follow the standard practice of using the UML approach and Java language to coding design patterns.

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別2. 物件導向與資料抽象化3. 類別與方法4. 訊息，實例與初始化5. 繼承6. 靜態與動態繫結7. 多型性8. 發展環境及工具9. 物件導向程式語言C++,Java,Smalltake簡介10.應用實例

description.zh: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with the knowledge and techniques essential in information security. The topics to be covered include: introductions to information security, conventional encryption, private key technologies, public key technologies and hash functions, message authentication code and protocols, authentication systems, Kerberos, X.509 7, E-Mail security, PGP, S/MIME, IP security, Web security, SHTTP, SSL (Secure Session Layer), system security, and firewall systems.

description.zh: 在需要分析大量資料數據的眾多研究領域，資料數據可視化技術扮演舉足輕重的角色。本課包含下列研究主題：資料模型與影像模型、視覺感知與認知、資料可視化步驟過程處理、空間感知與空間資料顯示、色彩使用與原理、使用解介面設計、互動模式、資料瀏覽與引導找尋、多變數多維度資料、樹狀與圖示、層級架構展現、複雜關係呈現、視覺化設計評估。
description.en: Data visualization plays an important role in a variety of study fields. This course includes the following topics: Data and Image Models, Visual Perception and Cognition, Process of Data Visualization, Space Perception and Display of Data in Space, Purpose of Color and Principles of Using Color in Visualization and UI Design, Interaction Models, Browsing and Navigation, Multivariate and Multidimensional Data, Trees and Graphs for Representing Hierarchies and Complex Relations, Evaluation of Visualization Design.

description.zh: 1.影像處理教學基礎2.影像輸出入系統3.點處理運算4.範圍影像處理5.頻域影像處理6.影像幾何轉換7.影像編碼8.影像分析
description.en: 1.Mathematic background of image processing2.Input and output systems for the image processing 3.Point processes4.Area processes5.Image processes in the frequency domain6.Geometric transformation7.Image coding 8.Image analysis

notes: 電機三甲乙丙合開,電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程將深入介紹檔案系統與儲存系統之作用原理，課程主軸將涵蓋 1. 輸出/輸入設備 2. 磁碟陣列與資料可靠性 3. 檔案系統基礎與設計原理 4. 分散式檔案系統 5. 新興儲存裝置 與 6. 鍵值儲存系統。修習本課程之學生將須要具備下列基礎知識，包含作業系統、C 語言以及基礎 Linux 指令。同時，本課程也將依照課程進展介紹最新的新興儲存裝置、檔案系統與儲存系統之相關研究以及大數據管理等議題。
description.en: This course will detail the working principles and design philosophy of file and storage systems and with prime focus on (1) I/O Devices, (2) RAID and Data Integrity, (3) File system Basics and Designs, (4) Distributed File System, (5) Emerging Storage Devices, (6) Key Value Stores. Please be noted that the knowledge of Operating System, C language, and the use of basic Linux command are required before taking this course. Depending on the current research trends, the course also discusses the latest applied storage topics, especially related to scalable and dependable big data management.

notes: 英文授課、資工四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 資料科學探索如何從大量、多元、非結構化的資料中發掘有價值的資訊，並有效提供相關的應用策略，探討的層面包括：資料處理及計算、資料儲存、數理統計及資料分析技術與應用等。本課程討論此一領域的進展，並使學生了解相關知識與技術工具，進而具備資料科學思維及應用能力。課程內容以廣度為主，主題包含資料管理、資料分析、資料視覺化、機器學習、深度學習，巨量資料等。
description.en: Data science explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to applications. It is integrative cross data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and skills of data analysis. This course introduces this rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques. The course will be given on breadth, rather than depth, and its topics include data management, data analysis, data visualization, machine learning, deep learning, big data, etc.

name.en: Principles and Applications of Data Science

notes: 英文授課、資工四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh: 本課程透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉GCP(Google Cloud Platform)及AWS(Amazon Web Service)提供之雲端開發框架，以設計大數據與人工智能應用系統。課程內容包括：資料擷取、轉換與儲存流程，資料建模、探勘與分析技術，語音、文字、影像等機器學習演算法設計，氣象、交通、互聯網、零售、金融與製造等領域人工智能應用系統開發案例。藉由實務個案教學及期末專題設計，讓學生掌握大數據分析方法，並能運用軟體工程技術，設計人工智能應用系統。
description.en: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to design big data and artificial intelligence application systems using GCP (Google Cloud Platform) or AWS (Amazon Web Service) cloud platform services.  Course spans a variety of big data processing technologies such as capturing data, data transfer, data storage, data analysis, model assessments, machine learning algorithms, and business application systems for artificial intelligence.  Programming exercises and term projects are included to help students understand the basic ideas and practical tools in big data analytics and artificial intelligence system design.

name.en: Big Data and Artificial Intelligence Application System Design

description.zh: Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Objective-C 語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用OpenGL es 實作有趣的3D 應用程式。本課程大致如下：1. 導論2. Objective-C3. iOS系統架構4.Xcode開發工具安裝與使用5.基礎UI設計與多國語言6. 核心應用程式設計7. 感應器應用8. 多媒體與相機功能9. OpenGL ES10. 擴增實境11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en: In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:˙Introduction to iOS˙How to program in Objective-C˙Using X-Code ˙The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application˙iOS MVC structure˙Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras˙Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files˙OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application˙Project Demo and Review˙How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

description.zh: 在需要分析大量資料數據的眾多研究領域，資料數據可視化技術扮演舉足輕重的角色。本課包含下列研究主題：資料模型與影像模型、視覺感知與認知、資料可視化步驟過程處理、空間感知與空間資料顯示、色彩使用與原理、使用解介面設計、互動模式、資料瀏覽與引導找尋、多變數多維度資料、樹狀與圖示、層級架構展現、複雜關係呈現、視覺化設計評估。
description.en: Data visualization plays an important role in a variety of study fields. This course includes the following topics: Data and Image Models, Visual Perception and Cognition, Process of Data Visualization, Space Perception and Display of Data in Space, Purpose of Color and Principles of Using Color in Visualization and UI Design, Interaction Models, Browsing and Navigation, Multivariate and Multidimensional Data, Trees and Graphs for Representing Hierarchies and Complex Relations, Evaluation of Visualization Design.

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。

This course will cover topics in energy and life, cellular and molecular biology, biological diversity, structure and function of plant and animal, and transmission genetics. description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。

This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。

description.en: This course mainly introduces sound design and electronic music production tools and skills. Through the introduction of audio editing technology and the use of related sound design tools, students can learn creative sound design. In the course, students are taught to use the Ableton Live sequencer software, combined with its sound design tools in Max for Live, to design their own software synthesizers and digital effects to be used in the sequencer. These skills may be used in multimedia design, game audio, new media performances, and etc.
