description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

description.zh: 分子模擬是一種廣泛應用在各工程領域的研究工具。針對研究目標的現象及材料，將巨觀尺度的系統映射到微觀尺度，以其組成原子和分子建立模型。模型內的原子則依循力場相互作用，於電腦上高速運算。所收集到的數據，透過統計力學的分析，可預測目標系統的巨觀性質。以此方法得到的資訊，可指引後期實驗開發的方向，以加速研發的進程並減少實驗的浪費。本課程旨在介紹常見的分子模擬理論和技巧，並協助各領域的同學對其專業問題進行實作。
description.en: Molecular simulation provides research guidelines and fundamental understandings for studying engineering problems and designing novel materials. The target material is modelled by a microscopic system which is constructed in the atomistic level. The simulations for such system are carried out on the computers based on the applied force field, and generate information that can be used in the future design. This course introduces the basic theories and tools in modern molecular simulations. Students from different majors can formulate simulation problems based on their expertise and interests.

description.zh: 資源工程的製程技術範圍包括了一些無機性及有機性物質的物理與化學變化。要有效的應用這些物質的製程技術，必須要對製程的化學反應動力學有基本的認識。本課程的主要目的在於教導學生如何設計一個程序以進行所要的化學反應。進行此類程序設計必須要將物理程序與化學程序的速率式相結合。而相關的基本原理包括：物理程序的能量傳送及質量傳送原理，及化學程序的反應動力學。為了達到這個目的，學生要對化學反應的本徵反應速率及程序的輸送現象有基本的認識。此外，本課程亦將介紹反應器設計的基本原理。據此，本課程的教學內容包括：1.	化學反應動力學2.	理想反應器的基本質量守恆3.	等溫與非等溫反應器原理4.	非均質反應程序、觸媒與吸附理論
description.en: Material and resources processing technologies focus on the physical and chemical process of inorganic and organic materials. For effective applications of these processing technologies, understanding the principles of chemical kinetics is essential. The major objective of this course is to learn how to design a process for carrying out desirable chemical reaction. To design this process requires rates of both physical and chemical processes. The principles governing such physical processes as energy transfer and mass transfer are often as important as those which govern chemical kinetics. To combine the rates of chemical and physical process, the essential feature is to understand the intrinsic rate of chemical reaction and the transport phenomena of the process. In addition, the basic principles of reactor design will also be introduced based on abovementioned fundamental principles. Therefore, the contents of this course include:1.	chemical kinetics2.	fundamentals of mass conser

description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce modern techniques for materials characterization, especially on surface characterization. description.en: This course is aimed to give an introduction for students who are interested in state-of-the-art cell culture technology. A review of the current development in cell biology and physiology will be introduced to students, and the course will allow students to understand the operation and design of cell culture reactors, and overall process design and optimization. Emphasis is given to new developments and strategies for the control of nutrient feeding and perfusion for both cell culture and tissue engineering. New processing technology and future prospects of vaccines and other biologicals and current good manufacturing practice (cGMP) guideline are also presented. Topics include sensing principles, commonly used sensors, strategies for achieving selectivity and adequate limits of detection, design of devices, and applications in health care, environmental monitoring, industry, and military areas. Articles from the current literature are discussed. We will also invite researchers to introduce current research. Active student participation is expected as an integral part of the course.

description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

notes: ◎日、職車輛所、能源與車輛外生和能源所合開

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，.灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。
description.en: Fuzzy control and grey system are introduced in this course.  Then students can apply these theories to control systems and vehicle control.  Contents are fuzzy sets, inference, design of fuzzy controller, application, gray system, gray prediction, gray modeling, and gray control.

notes: ◎日車碩、能源與車輛外生班和能源所合開

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

notes: ◎車輛所、能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 博士班化工組;合併化工碩士班專討上課

description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論-生化與生醫工程組

notes: 博士班生化組;合併生化碩士班專討上課

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之重點在於將熱力學機基本定律,應用於較為實際的化工問題上.主要內容包括:熱力學及輸送現象性質之估算方法,氣液相平衡及液液相平衡在分離製程的應用等.
description.en: The objectives of this course are to apply principles of thermodynamics in practical chemical processes. The contents of the curricula are 1) estimation of the thermodynamic and transport properties of fluids and solids, 2) vapor-liquid equilibrium as well as liquid-liquid equilibrium for separation processes application.

notes: 化工大三合開;原大三下化工熱力學

description.zh: 觀摩學習各企業以研發、創新、工安、環保為企業文化之核心元素，為台灣率先引領石化、科技產業邁向高值化的典範企業集團。以真實具體的企業經驗為教材，進而激發學生追求化工科技創新的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: The course will invite the domestic business to share their success experiences and new technologies. By offering the real design of chemical process equipments, research and innovation in development, industrial safety and hygiene, environmental protection and specific examples. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievements of chemical engineering to strengthen their innovation wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 企業實務講座-先進材料智慧製造
name.en: Business Lecture-Advanced Materials and Intelligent Manufacturing

notes: 預選限40人(大學部);化工大四和化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋了基於各種檢測模式(如化學修飾、電化學、光學與半導體科技)的化學與生醫感測器的基礎知識以及利用電子元件感測生理訊號。 主題包括感測原理、常見的化學感測器、生物感測器、選擇策略、元件設計以及醫療保健、環境監測和工業等領域的應用。課程安排除了感測器文獻之相關課堂討論之外，也會安排學者講座。學生參加所有講座和參加課堂討論是課程的必修部分。
description.en: This course covers the fundamentals of chemical sensors and biosensors based on chemical modifications, electrochemistry, spectroscopy, semiconductor technologies, and physiological electrical signal measurements. Topics include sensing principles, commonly used sensors, strategies for achieving selectivity and adequate limits of detection, design of devices, and applications in health care, environmental monitoring, industry, and military areas. Articles from the current literature are discussed. We will also invite researchers to introduce current research. Active student participation is expected as an integral part of the course.

notes: 預選限25人(大學部);化工三四和化工所合開

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

notes: 預選限30人(大學部);化工三四和化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程為培育學生創業與品牌智財管理能力的課程。課程規劃一系列主題講座，邀請不同領域的專家學者組成授課團隊，分享自己的創業與品牌智財管理經驗，著重培養學生的創業管理能力，品牌管理能力與智財管理能力。
description.en: The objective of this course is to develop the management abilities of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property for students. The curriculum is designed to include the special lectures given by the experts in various fields. The lecture will focus on the experience sharing and case studies.

name.en: Management of entrepreneurship, brand, and intellectual property

notes: 化工大四、化工所和創創專區合開

description.zh: 課程以循序漸進的方式，協助學生在陶藝創作上所需能力的支持及思維上的釐清。加強同學在陶藝材料運用上的廣度及深度，並學習自行發展主題性創意商品。課堂上以個別指導及分組討論的模式，協助學生發展自我的創作脈絡，以建立自我在概念及設計思考上的模式。
description.en: The course provides students with a step-by-step approach to support the creation of ceramics and to the creative thinking. Strengthen the ability of using ceramic materials by students, and learn to develop their own creative products. In the classroom, with individual guidance and group discussion, students are assisted in developing their own creative context to establish their own patterns in concept and design.

notes: 共同科館9樓工藝教室上課；限16人，課程配合USR計畫

description.zh: 本課程為傳統攝影的影像處理訓練。透過傳統暗房的操作，培養學生對影像品質的概念，可以訓練學生對事物的敏感度，耐心細心。
description.en: This course is a traditional photographic image processing training. Through traditional darkroom operations, training students the concept of image quality, sensitivity to things students can be trained, patient care.

notes: 修過109-1「攝影美學實踐講座」選修課程者優先；限20

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學   1.光學基本定律(3) 2.球面光學系統成像(3) 3.雷射光傳播特性(3) 4.光纖(6) 5.輻射度學與光度學(3)二、物理光學   1.光的電磁理論(3) 2.光波的疊加與分析(3) 3.光的干涉與干涉儀(6) 4.光學鍍膜(3) 5.光的繞射(6) 6.光的偏振(3) 7.晶體光學基礎(6)
description.en: A、Geometrical optics 1.Basic optical laws 2.Paraxial systems 3.Laser beams 4.Optical fiber 5.PhotometryB、Physical optics 1.EM waves of light 2.Superposition of light waves 3.Interference and interferometer 4.Optical coating and thin film 5.Diffraction 6.Polarization 7.Light in crystal

notes: ◎電腦教室,光電三四、光電所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程是研究所高等計算機圖學之應用延伸課程，著重於電腦動畫之程式設計技術。主題包含營造法式、建築圖解、物理動畫原理、骨架、關鍵格、逆運動學、動作捕捉、粒子系統等等。
description.en: This course is a graduate-level advanced computer graphics course focusing on the programming techniques in computer animation. Topics include construction principles, architectural illustrations, physically based animation, skeletons, key framing, inverse kinematics, motion capture, and particle systems.

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程被設計為介紹有關棉細紗、毛系紗、加工絲及複合紗製造系統，與其有關之細節亦被包括在內，其課程包含有製造流程、紡紗設備之機構與終端用途。此外，本課程被架構在朝向新式紡紗製造方法，製程管制與品質管制之新近發展，電腦控制系統與自動測試系統。纖維與成紗結構和性質間之相互關係及檢測亦被討論。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce in staple, filament and composite yarns manufacturing systems, which include manufacturing process, spinning mechanism and end applications. Furthermore, the course is structured towards an advanced study of the newer methods of yarn manufacture, and the latest developments in processing control and quality control, computerized control systems and automatic measuring systems. Relationships between fiber and yarn structural properties are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 介紹有機材料：如染料、界面活性劑、添加劑、單體、生物活性物質等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用等。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要是要讓學生對醫學設計之基本理論及實務內容有所認識。了解一個健康醫療產品/系統/服務從醫學及使用者需求的思維、如何發展到設計理念之形成、設計內容之導入實現、工程技術之開發、原型機製作、臨床前測試、臨床試驗、醫療認證、及工業管理等層次。讓學生能掌握跨領域之醫學設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計與開發方法引導醫學背景與設計背景之專業人士合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之健康醫療產品之關鍵課題、針對臨床服務需求，提出健康醫療創新解決方案。進而產生創新健康醫療產品。
description.en: This course aims to teach postgraduate students to understand the basic theory and practice of medical design. Learn about the health and medical products/ systems/ services from the discovery of medical and user needs to the design of innovative healthcare products, which include the topics of how to generate the design concepts, understand the user and market needs, develop the engineering technologies and prototype, design pre-clinical testing and clinical trials, obtain medical certification and plan industrial management. To enable students to master the principles of interdisciplinary medical design, and teach them how to use innovative product design and development approach to guide professionals in medical backgrounds and design backgrounds to understand the key issues in developing successful health medical products in the market and address the needs of clinical services, propose innovative solutions for health care, and develop innovative health and medical products.

notes: 2週◎創新所和設計博合開；問題導向課程【停開】

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊(及訓練演算法，支援向量機，線性及邏輯回歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等．
description.en: This introductory course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of this course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, this course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optiminizations, random search, decision tree,  random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model (with its training algorithm), support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques (LDA, PCA, ICA, FA), boosting methods, decision

description.zh: 資料科學探索如何從大量、多元、非結構化的資料中發掘有價值的資訊，並有效提供相關的應用策略，探討的層面包括：資料處理及計算、資料儲存、數理統計及資料分析技術與應用等。本課程討論此一領域的進展，並使學生了解相關知識與技術工具，進而具備資料科學思維及應用能力。課程內容以廣度為主，主題包含資料管理、資料分析、資料視覺化、機器學習、深度學習，巨量資料等。
description.en: Data science explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to applications. It is integrative cross data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and skills of data analysis. This course introduces this rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques. The course will be given on breadth, rather than depth, and its topics include data management, data analysis, data visualization, machine learning, deep learning, big data, etc.

name.en: Principles and Applications of Data Science

description.zh: 本課程將深入介紹檔案系統與儲存系統之作用原理，課程主軸將涵蓋 1. 輸出/輸入設備 2. 磁碟陣列與資料可靠性 3. 檔案系統基礎與設計原理 4. 分散式檔案系統 5. 新興儲存裝置 與 6. 鍵值儲存系統。修習本課程之學生將須要具備下列基礎知識，包含作業系統、C 語言以及基礎 Linux 指令。同時，本課程也將依照課程進展介紹最新的新興儲存裝置、檔案系統與儲存系統之相關研究以及大數據管理等議題。
description.en: This course will detail the working principles and design philosophy of file and storage systems and with prime focus on (1) I/O Devices, (2) RAID and Data Integrity, (3) File system Basics and Designs, (4) Distributed File System, (5) Emerging Storage Devices, (6) Key Value Stores. Please be noted that the knowledge of Operating System, C language, and the use of basic Linux command are required before taking this course. Depending on the current research trends, the course also discusses the latest applied storage topics, especially related to scalable and dependable big data management.

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

description.zh: 本課程探討人工智慧AI與工程應用相關議題，並討論解決方法與技術發展趨勢。內容由淺入深包含基礎python程式設計、資料預處理、資料探索、機器學習、深度學習、AI工程應用介紹(分子性質預測、設備預測性維護、混凝土強度預測，PM2.5預測、房價預測等案例應用分析)及專題製作。學生可由本課程了解AI之基本原理，及AI在工程上的應用，以作為進入產業後了解如何導入人工智慧於產業應用之中，提昇工程背景學生AI應用及程式設計的技能。
description.en: This course will introduce the artificial intelligence(AI) and application in engineering fields including basic python programming, data prepossessing, data exploration, machine learning, deep learning, AI application in engineering fields(Predicting Molecular Properties, Predictive Maintenance Predicting Compressive Strength of Concrete, Prediction of PM2.5, and Prediction of house price , etc.) and final project. Students can learn about the basic principles of AI and the application of AI in engineering to understand how to import artificial intelligence into industrial applications and improve their programming competence in AI applications.

notes: 工程學院院級選修,電腦教室

description.zh: 製造執行系統(MES)在產品從工單發出到成品產出的過程中，扮演生產活動最佳化的資訊傳遞者。MES運用即時、準確的資訊，指導、執行、回應並記錄工廠活動，從而能夠對條件的變化做出迅速的回應、減少無附加價值的活動、提高工廠運作過程的效率。MES不但可以改善設備投資報酬率，而且有助於及時交貨、加快庫存周轉、提高收益和現金流的績效，MES在企業和供應鏈間，以雙向交互的形式提供生產活動的基礎資訊。本課程將介紹MES概念及基本功能，並透過模擬與實作來讓學生了解MES之特性。
description.en: Manufacturing Execution System (MES) is the major information exchange portal of product records from order releasing to shipping. With real time data, MES allocates, implements, and responses to fulfill the production plans rapidly and at the same time improves the resource utilization by limiting non-value added activities. The benefit of using MES includes better performance in equipment ROI, on-time delivery, inventory turn-over rate, and hence higher revenue and cash-flow. Data collected by MES is served as the communication venue within the supply chain. This course focuses on the concept and basic functions of MES through simulation sections and practical cases.

name.zh: 智慧製造執行系統演練
name.en: Practice of Intelligent Manufacturing Execution System

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開甲乙20丙10

description.zh: 本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。     奠基於大學之前12年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
description.en: This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

notes: 0週;高級班,限外籍生修讀【停開】

description.zh: 介紹各種車輛使用先進駕駛輔助系統(Advanced Driver Assistance Systems, ADAS)、自駕車及車聯網設備的感測器及其應用。自駕車及車聯網亦需要多種感測器之支援，皆需要對應的感測器系統。同時也介紹先進工業儀器設備的感測器及其連結網路，包含運動控制相關感測器、視覺相關感測器、力量相關感測器與製程監控相關感測器四大主軸。
description.en: This course introduces the sensors used in Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS), autonomous vehicle and car-interconnected devices. These systems need the corresponding sensors in the real implementation. The sensors used in the industrial instruments, for motion, vision, force detection and process monitor, are also included in this course.

notes: 車輛三、四和機械三合開,限40人

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized.In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: 本課程依物理處理技術、化學處理技術、生化處理技術以及高溫處理技術等四個方向介紹處理的基本原理與方法。
description.en: This class divide the mineral processing into four categories, i.e., physical process, chemical process, biochemical process, and high temperature process.  The basic principles and processing techniques that can be applied to the mineral processing will be discussed extensively.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。

description.zh: 本課程結合電子產業最新趨勢與發展，讓學生學習電子產業相關領域的重要知識及了解最尖端之研究成果或開發成品，訓練學生在電子產業所需之技能。本課程視產業需要安排相關之教育訓練。
description.en: This course provides the latest trends and developments in the electronics industry, which will enable students to learn important knowledge in the electronics industry, and to understand cutting-edge research or develop finished products. The course aims to provide technical training for electronics industry. The relevant education training will be arranged depending on the industry needs.

description.zh: 近年來許多關於人工智慧、網路應用、甚至於嵌入式系統等等的場域皆使用Python來做為開發之程式語言。有鑑於多數的Python開發者皆將Python作為一般的直譯式程式語言，卻沒有善用到Python物件導向之特性，因此本門課將主要以Python物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉Python物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉Python之特性，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來開發網路前後端程式。
description.en: Recently, many artificial intelligence (AI), network, and embedded system application developers use Python programming language to implement their systems. However, many developers only take Python as a script language instead of using Python’s object oriented characteristics. This class will mainly start from programming Python by the object-oriented way. Students will be required to implement various kinds of assignments to learn the characteristics of Python objects. Besides, students can learn how to apply all kinds of Python application programming interfaces to understand the Python more. In the end of this class, students will be required to develop a network application containing a frond-end client and back-end server to show their achievements.

name.en: Advanced Object Oriented Programming in Python

notes: ◎綜科104，總上限30人，電子四、所與外生所合，英語

description.zh: 本課程指導學生進行智慧醫療與健康照護相關應用並解決問題，例如先進生醫感測器製作、先進檢測系統開發、生理信號監控、智慧神經生理信號診斷系統開發與驗證、神經回饋、智慧輔具與復健系統開發、IOT醫用系統開發、穿戴式感測應用，老師將指導學生完成專題並完成報告。
description.en: This course guides the students to conduct applications related to smart medical and healthcare, such as advanced biomedical sensor fabrication, advanced inspection system development, biomedical signal monotoring, dsmart iagnosis system development based on neurophysiological signals, neurlfeedback, smart prosthesis development, IOT-based medical system development, wearable-sensing applications. Insutrctors will also guide the students to  complete a project in the medical or smart healthcare application.

notes: 電子四甲乙和學程合開

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: ◎電子大四、電子所與電資外生所合開，英語授課

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。

description.zh: 這門課除了教授傳統企業環境管理及相關實務之外，特別將著重在企業提升如何透過綠色創新來提升綠色競爭力的策略與做法；此外，課程另一重點將會是企業如何透過協助聯合國永續發展目標(UN SDGs)的達成，來創造企業的永續競爭力。學生將會深入探究金字塔底層(BOP)與創造共享價值(Creating Shared Value, CSV)之理論及實務做法，以及成為一個真正永續企業的策略。
description.en: In this course, traditional corporate environmental management and the strategies for improving green competitiveness will be taught. In addition, the strategies of corporate sustainability- how the corporate to create sustainable competitiveness by coping with the 17 goals of UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (UN SDGs) will also be taught. Theories and practices of Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP) and Creating Shared Value (CSV), as well as the strategies of being a true sustainable enterprise will be emphasized in the class.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，除了相關的法令之外，亦包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系等
description.en: This course is to introduce the principles of 4R in the waste management. In addition to related regulations, contents of this course include pollution prevention approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對薄膜處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。薄膜的種類介紹包括薄膜逆滲透、奈米薄膜、超過濾、微過濾、前驅滲透、電透析以及薄膜生物處理。基本理論包括薄膜前處理、質量傳輸、積垢、結構、薄膜阻塞及清理、後處理及實務應用。
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of membrane process for water treatment, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ultrafiltration, microfiltration, forward osmosis, electrodialysis and membrane bioreactor. The theories include pretreatment, mass transfer, fouling, scaling, membrane cleaning, post treatment and practical application.

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程發展的學理，包括技職教育課程的意義﹑課程發展的基本原理及理論基礎，進而瞭解技職教育的類型及其發展模式，考量課程實施的各項條件，具備課程評鑑的觀念，最後能掌握技職教育課程的發展動向，同時對現行技職教育課程發展的實務問題，提出解決對策。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the rationale of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, including the concept of curriculum, theories of curriculum development, principles and models of curriculum development in technical-vocational education, and the problem of curriculum development in technical-vocational education in Taiwan.

description.zh: 身為一名專業教師，應對教學策略有深刻的瞭解，方能詳細考慮各項條件﹑採取適切的教學策略，提昇教學的成效。本課程之開設，即在使學習者熟悉教學策略的意義﹑教學策略的類型，提昇教學相關理念，並進一步應用所學，反思個人的教學，促進教學理論與教學實踐間的連結。
description.en: The course is designed to make the graduate understand the basic concept of instruction, to realize the various strategies for instruction in technical-vocational education, and to know how to apply and evaluate the strategies.

name.en: Instructional Strategies for Technical- Vocational Education

notes: 碩博課程 日夜合開

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎

description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Mechanical & Electrical Engineering students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調電資專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Electrical Engineering and Computer Science students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

name.zh: 進階專業英文- 電資

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的選修課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由課堂講授與實際場域參訪，使修課學生能夠瞭解現今整個鐵道資通訊系統與行控中心的架構、配置、功能及目標。在後電氣化時代，資通訊技術（Information and Communication Technology, ICT）的發展與創新應用，將定義了整個鐵道產業的未來。由於鐵道資通訊系統本身屬於跨管理、資訊與通訊等專業領域的技術，因此，本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式，針對選讀學程之學生，邀請鐵道資通訊技術應用專家，以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時，針對管理、資訊、通訊三部分提出通訊系統與行控中心規劃與評估報告，並邀請學者與產業專家擔任評審。
description.en: This course is the elective subject of Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The main purpose of this course is to provide the students an overall understanding of the structure, configuration, function, and the objective of the domestic railway industry and operation control center (OCC). The course will be organized with practical technology lecturing and on-site field visiting.In the post-electrification era, development and innovative application of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) will dictate the future of railway industry. ICT of railway industry is interdisciplinary which involves management, information, communication, etc. This intercollegiate course will invite industrial instructors, i.e. ICT experts from some relevant fields in intelligent railway industry, to our course.In the final project, students are required to plan and assess the communication system and OCC focused on management, information, and communication. description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about current events in the news and from the internet. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about other countries, globalism, business, politics, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.zh: 本課程欲讓學生了解改變社會結構之全球議題與趨勢。特此希望學生在參與討論的過程中，能夠產出對世界有正面效益之改善之道。課堂限制之關係，課程內容將著重於閱讀、答辯，和研討篩選後之報告及新聞，藉以達到上述之目的。
description.en: This course aims to engage students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world. The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自新聞報紙（如New York Times與 The Guardian）、雜誌（如Times）與網路新聞（如CNN Student News）等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，以提升其閱讀技巧與能力，同時拓展對世界的認識。另外亦藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，並配合聽力技巧的學習，以達成理解能力的提升。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading and listening abilities by using English news reports selected from newspapers (e.g. New York Times and The Guardian), news magazines (e.g. Times and Newsweek) and online news websites (e.g. CNN Student News). It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to strengthen students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels.

description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 基礎英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Basic English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自新聞報紙（如New York Times與 The Guardian）、雜誌（如Times）與網路新聞（如CNN Student News）等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，以提升其閱讀技巧與能力，同時拓展對世界的認識。另外亦藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，並配合聽力技巧的學習，以達成理解能力的提升。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading and listening abilities by using English news reports selected from newspapers (e.g. New York Times and The Guardian), news magazines (e.g. Times and Newsweek) and online news websites (e.g. CNN Student News). It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to strengthen students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調人文專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service cultural business students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於介紹個體經濟學理論及其相關應用，課程內容涵蓋主題包括：消費者行為與決策、不確定性與資訊不對稱、外部性與公共財、廠商行為與決策、產業型態與市場結構、生產要素市場、賽局理論、一般均衡與經濟效率、以及其他個體經濟的相關議題。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the main methods of systematic economic reasoning. It provides a rigorous treatment of microeconomic theory and its applications. Topics covered in the course will include the theories of consumer behavior; the economics of uncertainty and information; the economics of the public sector; firm behavior and the organization of industry; the economics of labor markets; game theory; and selected topics in general equilibrium and welfare economics.

description.zh: 資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知。課程規劃如下：資訊安全介紹,基礎密碼學介紹,電腦病毒與惡意程式,網路安全與攻擊,網路安全防護,應用層安全, 網頁安全,雲端安全,物聯網安全,個人資料保護
description.en: Introduction to Information Security is a fundamental course. The main objective of this course is to enable students in the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a better understanding of information security. The course describes as follows: Information security introduction, Basic cryptography, Network security and attacks, Network security protection, Application security, Web security, Cloud security, Internet of Things security, Personal data protection

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 資財二甲、二乙合開/科研240教室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創新服務設計能力，融合服務設計觀點完成服務藍圖。其中著重於智慧聯網應用場域所可能涵蓋的各類產品及其服務設計之學習與實作達成本課程之學習目標。課程中透過智慧聯網科技趨勢等智慧聯網服務與應用內涵、智慧化情境發想、關係人洞察、產品服務藍圖、可行性分析、產品概念設計、營運計畫書規劃等系統化流程與方法，搭配國內外指標案例解析及實務案例，使學生瞭解創新智慧化服務設計的內涵，具備規劃服務設計的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to develop students' innovative service design capabilities and integrate service design perspectives to complete the service blueprint. It focuses on the learning and implementation of the various products and service designs that may be covered by the Smart Connected Application Domain to achieve the learning objectives of this course.In the course, through the networked services such as smart networking technology trends and application connotation, intelligent situational thinking, relationship insight, product service blueprint, feasibility analysis, product concept design, operational plan planning and other systematic processes and methods, with Domestic and international indicators case analysis and practical cases enable students to understand the connotation of innovative and intelligent service design and have the ability to plan service design.

name.en: The Special Topics on Innovation and Service Design

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅B2C市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來DIY速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生建立足夠的知識與技能在企業研究方法上。課程內容主要分為兩部分， 第一部分將首先介紹論文架構開始，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、資料收集、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以Excel進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in business research methods. The content of the course can be divided by two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, data collection, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin from the introduction of different quantity methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussion, assignment, term-projects and in class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory and some basic multivariate analysis.

notes: ◎IMBA&IMFI&工管所&管理博班&技職所,電腦教室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密量測學概論、長度量測、角度量測、量規設計、幾何誤差量測（含直線度、平行度、垂直度、真圓度、平面度）、光學平鏡、光學投影機、三次元量測、齒輪檢測儀、工具機檢測。
description.en: Metrology Introduction, distance measurements, angular measurements, the design of limit gauges, measurement of geometrical tolerance (straightness, parallelism, squareness, roundness, flatness, etc.), optical plate, profile projector, coordinate measuring machine, gear measurements, machine tool metrology.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
description.en: Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程讓學生熟悉機電系統之整合技術與設計(如機電介面之原理、機械系統、感測與致動之原理及其元件、自動控制技術等)。實務製作以分組方式實施，內容包括PC及DSP微處理器控制之倒單擺平衡系統、熱爐箱溫度控制、或自走機器人設計與控制等。
description.en: The course contains technology and design of mechatronic system. For example: interface principle, mechanical system design, sensor and actuator device, and automatic control, etc. Hands-on experiments are carried out by team work and may include PC-based and microprocessor-based control of inverted pendulum system, oven temperature control, or mobile robot design and control.

notes: 機械三合開/先修課程：自動化控制元件應用

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: 機械三合開/限70人/中英雙語

description.zh: 工業4.0智能工廠因為大量使用電腦資訊流進行智慧控制達到產線無人化境地，雲端資料庫技術是智能工廠的核心技術，從智慧排單到網頁控制，達到智能聯網與控制。
description.en: The industry 4.0 intelligent factory uses large amount of information to reach intelligent control without people. Cloud database technology is the core of an intelligent factory, which can reach the intelligent network and control from intelligent production order to website control.

description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: ◎甲組選修/機電.製科.自動.能源.外生和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程係培養師資生運用資訊科技輔助教學及學生學習的基本素養，透過概念的介紹、範例的觀摩、以及實地的操作，讓學生瞭解利用資訊科技輔助教學的準備、過程、以及可能面對的議題。具體目標：（一）瞭解資訊科技輔助教學及數位學習相關理論；（二）發展認識及挑選教學及學習資源的能力；（三）發展資訊科技輔助教學之電腦實務能力；（四）瞭解資訊科技輔助教學當前趨勢與倫理等議題。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand how to make teaching material for every different course. The contents of this course include how to make transparency, slide, and video tape. Furthermore, MS Office PowerPoint will be introduced in this class.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

notes: 機械三、四.訓四機四甲乙.攜四機四合開，產業接軌課程

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的進階基礎課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由先進智慧鐵道系統的介紹，使修課學生能夠清楚瞭解鐵道產業的未來發展方向，並引領學生積極投入各種先進智慧鐵道應用系統之研究。本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請智慧鐵道系統相關、學有專精的技術研發人員、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時進行實作系統的展示，並邀請鐵道產業專家擔任評審。修習本課程前，不同學系之學生須先修習的課程清單另訂定之。
description.en: This course is one of the advanced core courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The aim of this course is, via the introduction of advanced intelligent rail system, to have the students realize thoroughly the development trend of futuristic rail industry, and subsequently, to encourage the students into the research and development of various application systems for intelligent railway. This course is a joint lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors to our participant students include R&D experts from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In their term reports, the students will have to demonstrate the prototypes of their projects and to be reviewed by the invited senior professionals from rail industry. The prerequisites for taking this course will be determined based on the background of students with different majors.

notes: 機械三、四.訓四甲乙.攜四機四合開，高深問題導向課程

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 製造聯網整合技術配合感測器、控制器、網路系統等，讓人、機器人、原物料、零組件、重要物品或設備，取得人、機、料、法、環的訊息，透過大數據分析與人工智慧，執行各種事前診斷預防、維護、事發處置及事後重建與改善的動作。本課程著重於製造聯網整合技術與實施方法，特別在智能工廠技術包含IoT、感測器設計與選擇、機電整合、數據分析、預防診斷與維修、智慧適應控制等。
description.en: Integration technology for networking manufacturing systems integrates sensor, controller, networking system, etc.. This technology uses big data analysis and artificial intelligence to communicate among human, robot, raw material, parts, important article or equipment, which can do prediction, protection, and improvement, etc.. This course focuses on integration technology for networking manufacturing systems and its practical implementation. The intelligent factory consists of IoT, design and selection of sensors, integration of electromechanics, data analysis, preventive diagnosis and repair, intelligent adaptive control, etc..

name.en: Integration Technology for Networking Manufacturing Systems

notes: 機械四合開和智慧感測學程合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。量測原理及訊號處理的一般方法（含放大電路、動態響應及頻譜分析），說明各種感測器之原理、規格、結構圖、應用的場合及其訊號處理（含速度、位移、加速度、力量、扭矩、功率、壓力、流量、溫度、化學組成、濕度、濃度、照度、電流、電壓、磁通量、磁場強度、各型感測開關等），感測器與電腦之連線。
description.en: Measurement Principles, General Methods for Signal Processing (Amplified Circuits, Dynamic Response, and Frequency spectrum Analysis), Discussion of Principle, Specification, Structure, Occasion and Location of Application of a Variety of Sensors for Measuring Physical Quantities,such as Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Force, Torque, Power,Pressure, Flow Rate, Temperature, Chemical Composition, Humidity,Density, Luminosity, Current, Voltage, Magnetic Flux, Magnetic Intensity , a Variety of Sensing Switch, etc.

notes: 機械二合開/限40人/(校)電腦教室，課程配合USR計畫

description.zh: 1.簡介  2.隨機向量之性質  3.假設測試  4.參數分類  5.參數估計 6.非參數密度估計  7.非參數分類和錯誤估計  8.連續參數估計9.特徵抽取線性對應信號表示  10. 特徵抽取線性對應分類11.分群法  12.應用
description.en: 1. Introduction  2.Random vectors and their properties  3.Hypothesis testing   4. Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在促進學生進一步瞭解文化典藏加值應用之概念與方法，並著重於文化典藏單位及其所典藏物件之轉化與詮釋。透過本課程之授課內容，學生可培養以下幾個能力：（1）認識文化典藏加值應用之基本概念；（2）理解文化典藏加值應用之原則與倫理；（3）具備文化典藏應用評估、規劃之專業素養。
description.en: The aim of this course is to facilitate students' understanding of the concepts and methods applied to cultural collections' application, with an emphasis on the transformation and interpretation of cultural collections they contain. In this course, students will develop the following skills: (1) understanding the basic concepts of value-added application of cultural collections; (2) understanding the principles and ethics of value-added application of cultural collections; and (3) professional competence in the evaluation and planning of the application of cultural collections.

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

notes: ◎自動化所、機電科博及機電博外生班合開

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程以R語言介紹資料科學和數據可視化。本課程注重於資料科學的實際應用，學生將學習到如何整理、探索、轉換和數據可視化。 學生以作業練習和獨立項目來獲得實數據科學的基本技能。
description.en: This course introduces data science and data visualization through the R language. Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing. In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

description.zh: 本課程以R語言介紹資料科學和數據可視化。本課程注重於資料科學的實際應用，學生將學習到如何整理、探索、轉換和數據可視化。 學生以作業練習和獨立項目來獲得實數據科學的基本技能。
description.en: This course introduces data science and data visualization through the R language. Focusing on applied data science skills, students will be introduced to the methods to tidy, explore, transform, and visualize data. Students will practice them with real data in exercises and projects.

notes: 經管三、四和經管所合開

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹東西方傳統工藝的本質及現代的演進歷程，並配合工藝設計名作介紹，認識當代工藝發展思潮。從講解文化設計美學與工藝鑑賞的理論基礎，幫助學生瞭解文化設計未來發展趨勢，培養對於傳統工藝的鑑賞品味。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the modern evolution of the traditional crafts in the East and the West, and to introduce the trend of contemporary craft design development. This course explains the theoretical basis of cultural design aesthetics and process appreciation to help students understand the future development trend of cultural design and cultivate the appreciation and taste of traditional crafts.

description.zh: 本課程目標是協助學生透過校園環境整理及打掃體驗活動，認識勞作教育之理念，從勞作課程中養成同學不怕苦、不怕難與不怕髒的企業家精神，使學生透過實際的勞作課程，培養學生手腦並用，勤勞愛物的觀念，培養學生健全的人格、良好品德、正確的價值觀及刻苦耐勞的工作態度。課程內容：包含四大階段（一）勞作教育理念介紹：選取勞作教育相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含勞作教育意義、勞作教育前測作業說明（二）勞作教育實作階段：勞作課程分三項不同情境施作。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須於各實作階段課程進行討論與反思，並撰寫心得報告、完成後測作業。（四）期末成果分享：勞作教育期末成果分享，並辦理獎勵工作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the idea of labor service to students. Students who take this course have to participate in the campus cleaning activities. This is to help students building up: (i) the team-work abilities; (ii) the concepts of ethics; (iii) the abilities of concerning the society. In addition, the course would help students to develop the accurate attitudes in the daily life and the healthy personalities. Furthermore, this course would also help students to enrich the sense of humanities. Four stages are included in this course: (i) the introduction of the labor service, (ii) the field work studies, (iii) the class discussions, and (iv) sharing of the experiences of the labor service.

description.zh: 本課程旨在經由對文化經濟學的認知，解讀文化經濟的發展邏輯與運行機制，建構文化經濟知識體系，期能為文化市場與文化產業發展提供理論基礎與思維座標。課程主要內容，一為在經濟邏輯運行下的文化活動，諸如文化產品、文化事業、文化資本、文化產業、文化市場等；另一為經濟活動所反映與體現的文化因素，以及對經濟運行產生作用的思維價值等。
description.en: The course aims through awareness of cultural economics to interpret the development logic and operating mechanism of cultural economy and to construct a cultural economic knowledge system, and is expected to provide the theoretical basis and thinking coordinates for the development of cultural markets and cultural industries.The main content of the course is economic logics underpinned cultural activities, such as cultural products, cultural business, cultural capital, cultural industries and cultural markets; on the other hand, cultural factors reflected and experienced by economic activities, as well as the value of thinking which plays an important role in economic activities.

description.zh: 硬體簡介、影像處理(單色、彩色、3D及即時)、圖案識別(Patten Recognition)、機械視覺於順序控制之應用、機械視覺於回授控制之應用、高速檢測、機械人與機械視覺之結合及應用。
description.en: Introduction to Hardware of Vision System, Image Processing (Monochrome, Color, 3D and real-time), Pattern Recognition, Application of MV to Sequential Control Application of MV to Feedback Control. High Speed Inspection, Combined Applications of Robotics and MV.

description.zh: 本課程將分理論、作品研讀與實地操作三部份。首先介紹口述歷史與田野調查理論。之後透過研讀相關作品瞭解該主題之歷史。在理論與實例示範的基礎之下，修課學生擬定田野調查地或口述主題，並定期報告進行情況，期末需有成果報告的分享與討論。
description.en: This course is divided into theory, work study and field operation. Under the basis of theory and model demonstration, students will choose one topic and report it regularly. At the end of this semester, a final report is needed.

description.zh: 本課程目的為提供學生教具與教學環境，使得學生在習得智慧製造基礎原理後，透過本課程能更加清楚感測與智慧分析技術在各種專題上之應用方法，以及可能遇到的實務問題。具體內容包含巨量資料擷取、儲存、與管理、製程優化的應用、故障診測與健康管理技術(PHM)、智慧型演算之應用、網宇實體系統(CPS)等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with teaching aids and teaching environment, so that after learning the basic principles of smart manufacturing, students can more clearly understand the application methods of sensing and intelligent analysis techniques on various topics, as well as practical problems that may be encountered. The specific content includes big data acquisition, storage, and management, process optimization application, fault diagnosis and Prognostics and Health Management (PHM), applications of intelligent algorithms, and the Cyber Physical System (CPS).

notes: 限缺一門綜整課程之學生修習,大研合開

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: ◎電子大四、電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 近年來許多關於人工智慧、網路應用、甚至於嵌入式系統等等的場域皆使用Python來做為開發之程式語言。有鑑於多數的Python開發者皆將Python作為一般的直譯式程式語言，卻沒有善用到Python物件導向之特性，因此本門課將主要以Python物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉Python物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉Python之特性，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來開發網路前後端程式。
description.en: Recently, many artificial intelligence (AI), network, and embedded system application developers use Python programming language to implement their systems. However, many developers only take Python as a script language instead of using Python’s object oriented characteristics. This class will mainly start from programming Python by the object-oriented way. Students will be required to implement various kinds of assignments to learn the characteristics of Python objects. Besides, students can learn how to apply all kinds of Python application programming interfaces to understand the Python more. In the end of this class, students will be required to develop a network application containing a frond-end client and back-end server to show their achievements.

name.en: Advanced Object Oriented Programming in Python

notes: ◎綜科104，總上限30人，電子四、所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 數學基礎	- 機率	- 隨機程序：自相關函數與功率密度函數，高斯程序、白雜訊	- 正交開展與線性濾波	- 取樣與量化3. 最佳接收器設計	- 信號的幾何表示	- 最大事後機率與最大可能接收原理	- 相配濾波器	- 錯誤機率4. 數位調變與多工技術	- 數位調變：振幅移鍵調變、相位移鍵調變、四相振幅調變、頻率移鍵調變	- 數位調變的取捨條件：錯誤機率、功率、頻寬與複雜度	- 多工技術：分頻多工、分時多工、分碼多工5. 消息理論簡介	- 源編碼與熵	- 通道編碼與通訊容量

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何設計與應用微控制器，啟發學生對於微控制器的創意設計。包含：1.相關程式撰寫、2.跑馬燈程式撰寫與實作驗證、3.序列埠控制 (監控視窗、LED控制)、4.七段顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、5.LED矩陣程式撰寫與實作驗證、6.LCD顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、7. PWM馬達控制程式撰寫與實作驗證、8. I2C介面程式撰寫與實作驗證、9.電子琴程式撰寫與實作驗證。10.超音波感測程式撰寫與實作驗證。
description.en: This course is to train students for microcontrollers design and applications.  Inspire students to creative microcontroller design. Comprising: 1. Related programs written. 2. Marquee program written and implement verification. 3. Serial port control (monitoring windows, LED control). 4. Seven segment display program written and implement verification. 5. LED matrix program written and implement verification. 6. LCD display program written and implement verification. 7. PWM motor control program written and implement verification. 8. I2C interface program written and implement verification. 9. Keyboard program written and implement verification. 10. Ultrasonic sensing program written and implement verification.

Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

Therefore it is essential to compress the video to save the bandwidth and maintain good video quality. Students will understand the concept of video compression and implement to improve the video coder. ��	Image format, Image quality��	Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT)��	Scalar quantization and vector quantization��	JPEG: DCT, zonal coding, threshold coding��	JPEG: Zigzag, huffman coding in JPEG��	MPEG��	H.264, H.265, H.266��	Multi-View Coding (MVC)
