notes: ◎綜科104，電子所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 當代飾品設計及製作是一門以實作為主，實務講述為輔的設計性課程。透過實務教學進行，提供學生基礎金工珠寶的製作能力並進行應用。課程旨在結合金屬工藝與多元媒材的當代趨勢，引導學生系統性的完成作品後，將透過展演形式發表成果。
description.en: This course will use a combination of lectures, demonstrations, and practical experiences to educate the student in the basic skills required to work as a member of jewelry design discipline. This class will also be an introduction to the multiple media of design. Contemporary Jewelry Design will provide an overview of the professional world of Jewelry design through a practical exhibition.

description.zh: 期使學生瞭解地震工程學涵蓋之領域，並簡介地球物理學、地質學、地震學、振動學、材力、土壤力學、結構動力學、施工技術以及彈性波動學各領域之基本知識，讓學生領悟如何將各學門知識領域應用於地震工程之設計與施工。
description.en: Use of soil mechanics principles in the analysis,design,and construction of structures.Principles of compaction and compaction control;an introduction to slope stability analysis and landslides;earth reinforcement systems,and ground impovement techniques.

description.zh: 本課程講授內容兼顧理論與實務。促使學習土木工程學生瞭解施工安全及衛生的重要性，如何規劃推動各項安全管理實務工作。確認施工觀念，發揮全面防災功能，確保施工安全與衛生。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: Safety and disaster preclusion of opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程欲讓應用英文系學生了解改變社會結構之全球議題與趨勢。特此希望學生在參與討論的過程中，能夠產出對世界有正面效益之改善之道。課堂限制之關係，課程內容將著重於閱讀、答辯，和研討篩選後之報告及新聞，藉以達到上述之目的。
description.en: This course aims to engage English major students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world.  The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.

name.zh: 全球議題與趨勢討論(二)
name.en: Discussions on Global Issues and Trends II

notes: 大二多元英文(僅限英文系學生修讀)

description.zh: 你熱愛文學嗎?你對社會及社會影響世界的方式好不好奇?你想不想探索社會政治事件表面背後的意涵?你喜不喜愛語言? 你是否會對許多故事的力量和神奇之處著迷?如果你的答案是否定的，透過這門課程，你會發現文學提供了既有價值又發人深省的社會觀點。反之，如果你熱愛文學，並且早已深受文學語言的吸引，你在這門課程裡將可從文學間接獲取豐富的生活經驗，進而學會如何理解世界。具體而言，藉由探索文學和社會的互動關係，透過研究社會如何促成文學的產生、賦之予脈絡，並加以型塑，以及文學如何反映、影響、塑造、及改變社會，你將會瞭解文學及語言的力量，更重要的是能在所處之世界裡變得安然自在。我們可能研讀的作品包括，但不限於，Things Fall Apart, Anthills of the Savannah, Uncle Tom’s Cabin, 1984, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close等書。
description.en: Do you have a passion for literature? Are you curious about society and the way it influences the world around us? Would you like to explore the facade of sociopolitical events? Do you love language and are you fascinated by the power and magic of stories? If not, you will nevertheless learn in this course that literature provides a valuable and inspiring perspective on society. On the other hand, if you have already had a strong passion for literature and if you are already fascinated by literary language, you will learn in this course how to make sense of your world by enriching your vicarious experiences of it through literature. Specifically, by exploring the interaction between literature and society, by studying not only how society gives rise to, contextualizes, and molds literature, but also how literature mirrors, influences, shapes, and changes society, you will realize the power of literature and language and, more importantly, become at home in the world. The texts we will

notes: 大二多元英文(僅限英文系學生修讀)

description.zh: 結晶學已經是成為當今科學研究領域的一門重要知識與技術。至目前為止至少有20位諾貝爾獎得主其貢獻都與結晶學有關。在這課程，我們將闡述結晶學的相關基本知識，例如: 晶格、對稱、原子散射、結構因子及解結構。此外，這門課程也將涵蓋實際操作解結構。所有基礎知識與實作，涵蓋單晶繞射與粉末繞射。也將涵蓋部分蛋白質結晶學的基本知識。
description.en: Crystallography has become an important field in scientific knowledge and technique in physics, chemistry, materials, and biology, which has been recognized by more than 20 winners of Nobel prize. In this course, we will illustrate the fundamental knowledge about crystal lattice, symmetry, atomic scattering, structure factor, and structure determination. In addition, the course also includes practices in structure determination by single crystal x-ray diffraction and powder x-ray diffraction. All fundamental knowledge and practices are mainly in small molecular cases, but part of knowledge of protein crystallography will also be included.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 固態化學是一門涵蓋物理、化學、與材料的跨領域科學。在此課程，我們將講述如何應用化學的知識與概念來了解固態材料，這包含晶體結構，化學鍵結、繞射、光譜、與熱分析技術。此外，我們也將用物理化學的觀念，來討論固態材料的光、電與磁的特性。
description.en: Solid state chemistry is a multidisciplinary filed which covers the physics, chemistry and material science. In this course, we will illustrate how to use chemistry knowledge to approach the solid state materials, which includes the crystal structure, chemical bonding, diffraction techniques, spectroscopy, and thermal analysis. Moreover, the electrical, magnetic and optical properties of solid state materials will also be discussed by the point of view of physical chemistry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械之機械控制、電氣控制、數值控制、幾何數據處理、驅動系統、適應控制系統、監視系統與診斷系統、機器人控制、電腦整合精密機械系統。
description.en: Mechanical control, electrical control, numerical control, geometric data processing, drive systems, adaptive control systems, monitoring and diagnostic systems, and Computer Integrated precision Machinery Systems.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: ◎乙組◎8選2/甲組選修/機電.製科.能源.外生班和機電

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

notes: ◎製科所、機械外生班和機電博班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 塑性加工概論、金屬變形機構、冷作加工、鈑金成形理論、塑性加工產品檢驗、塑性加工機械與模具、個案討論。
description.en: Introduction to plastic metal working, Metal forming mechanism and mechanics, Cold working, Sheet metal forming, Product inspection and quality control, Metal forming machines and tools, and Case study.

name.en: Special Topic on plastic metal working

notes: ◎製科所、機械外生班和機電博班合開

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: ◎乙組選修/限30人/機電所、外生班和機電博班合開

description.zh: (1) 草繪。 (2) 基本特徵、3D實體零件設計。 (3) 工程特徵、3D實體零件設計 (4) 3D零件組裝 (5) 工程製圖
description.en: (1) Sketching. (2) Basic features, 3D part design. (3) Engineering features, 3D part design. (4) 3D part assembly. (5) Engineering drawing

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解如何由自動控制理論與概念,轉化成控制系統的實務設計與實踐。課程內容包括: 機構、致動器、感測器、與控制器等元件及其整合技術介紹, 配合LabView + myRIO及周邊設備進行控制系統實務設計與測試,使同學由實驗中體會與培養控制系統的實務設計能力。
description.en: The object of the course is to let students understand how to transform the theory and concept of automatic control into a design and practice for a control system. Course contents include: introduction to mechanism, sensors actuator and controller elements, as well as the needed integration technique. LabView + myRIO and peripheral devices are used in the course to design a practically useful controller and to verify its effectiveness. Students therefore can gain the practical controller design experience via this learning by doing approach。

name.en: Design and Practice of  Control System

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

description.zh: 3D列印（英語：3D printing），又稱加法製造、積層製造（Additive Manufacturing，AM），可指任何列印三維物體的過程。3D列印主要是一個不斷添加的過程，在電腦控制下層疊原材料。3D列印的內容可以來源於三維模型或其他電子資料，其列印出的三維物體可以擁有任何形狀和幾何特徵。本課程將介紹其原理及配合實機操作，使學生能對3D列印技術有正確的認識。(本課程鼓勵學生參加經濟部iPas的3D列印工程師考試)
description.en: 3D printing, also known as additive manufacturing (AM), refers to processes used to create a three-dimensional object in which successive layers of material are formed under computer control to create an object. Objects can be of almost any shape or geometry and are produced using digital model data from a 3D model or another electronic data. This course will introduce the principle knowledge of 3D printing and giving the opportunity to practice the use of 3D Printing.

name.en: The theory and practice of 3D Printing

notes: 機械四合開/實作課 限30人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 歷史想像讓人可以掙脫現實世界，縱橫遨遊於歷史之海。本課程學習相關歷史，培養學生利用本地文化為素材，學習文化相關創作、鑑賞的基礎知識。現代人對影像敏銳度很高，藉由「影視史學」的圖像與影像的引領，使修課同學瞭解各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。以活潑的史實，引領同學多面向的思考，理解多元價值的真諦。
description.en: Historical imagination can release us from the bonds and limits of reality by giving us various perspectives of ideas, values and patterns of life over times. Now through the media of film, a powerful recorder of life and events, this course intends to equip students with an ability to appreciate a film as a cultural and historical text so as to seek the presence of historical phenomena and sociological significance. Vivid cases of film evidence will be presented to inspire students to interpret and reevaluate the great historical issues of the times so that they can understand the true essence of many values and foster the capacity of multi-dimensional thinking.

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 主要課程內容包含電腦基本常識，程式設計簡介，資料型態，流程控制，函式，副程式，陣列與字串，檔案，應用程式設計。
description.en: An introduction to basic computer concept, programming, data types, flow of control, functions, subroutine, arrays, strings, files, and applications

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: ◎限博士生修習,製科所和機電科所合開

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: ◎限博士班修習；與外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 課程主軸以實務應用為出發點，擬建立水情與洪氾模擬的整合系統。其系統架構包含下列主要項目：1.連結雷達降雨QPESUMS與數值氣候模式的資料，用以作為整個系統的主要輸入資料來源；2.建立模擬計算能量，包含降雨逕流、渠道、下水道、水利設施、邊界條件如下游潮位、以及二維漫地流淹水模式；3.動態展示所有資料與計算成果，包含一維與二維的時序列資料；4.各種轉換處理，包含圖層套疊、空間內插、時間序列補遺等。學員需要設立水情模擬整體環境以及熟悉各項子架構之間的連結，再者，用此系統來對應評估颱洪事件的應變計畫與治理設計，也是相當課程相當著重的部分。
description.en: An integrated system is expected in this class to carry out flood simulation under the configuration close to real practice.  The configuration includes:1.forcing data from QPESUMS which is radar rainfall as well as NWP, numerical weather prediction, usually used in emergency response;2.models considering rainfall round-off, channels, sewers, hydraulic structures, boundary conditions like tidal setup, and 2D overland flow to simulate the flooding area;3.dynamic demonstration which presnets all the possible calculated results as 1D or 2D time series;4.transformation contains spatial overlay, interpolation, and gap filling.Students are asked to setup the environment and familiar with the links among all the configuration.  In addition, planning and response to a typhoon event with the system are encouraged as well as the system development.

notes: 四甲乙&防災所合開/大學部上限10人

description.zh: 近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1)了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2)評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3)新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。學習成效：學生可獲得：(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en: The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. This course is designed for students without an extensive background in science or math and can be used to partly satisfy minor programs in Environmental Geosciences.Learning Outcomes: Upon completion of this course, students will

notes: ◎三四甲乙&防災所合開/大學部上限25人/全英授課

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

description.zh: 基本或然率，可靠度概念與定義，不確定性分析，可靠度分析之方法，可靠度導向設計，系統可靠度。
description.en: The analyses of structure reliability   Basic,the concept and definition of reliability uncertain analyses, the method of reliable analyses , reliability -orient design , system reliability.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 本課程內容有:1.儀器裝置,應變計原理與使用方法.2.驗証簡支樑之彎曲理論.3.驗證馬克斯維爾反相定理.4.桁架試驗.5.剛架試驗.6.壓構材欴挫屈試驗.7.構材扭轉試驗.
description.en: Introduction: 1.Instrumentation. 2.Simple bending. 3.Maxwell's Reciprocal theorem. 4.Truss. 5.Rigid frame. 6.Buckling test. 7.Torsion test.

description.zh: 本課程將以工程資訊管理之觀點，介紹國內外工程資訊管理及營建自動化案例，包含資訊管理程式撰寫及探討資料庫之設計與實作，希望學生能夠由設計一個資訊系統開始，瞭解工程資訊管理系統之基本概念與應用，進而實際開發一個資訊管理系統，其內容包括：營建自動化應用，建築資訊模型應用，國內外工程資訊管理案例探討，工程資訊之分析與設計，資訊管理程式撰寫，資料庫系統之設計與實作，及系統分析與設計等方法。
description.en: This course will provide students with the application of engineering information management and the practice of construction management system, management information system concept, the introduction of database design, building information management application, web-based project management system development, integrate construction management information system's introduction, the introduction of construction automation application, the future of engineering information management and other special topics.

name.en: Special Topics on Engineering Information Management

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 工程進度規劃與控制是營建工程進行專案管理時之重要知識與技術，此課程包含ADM 及PDM網圖、要徑分析、PERT分析、趕工計畫、及實獲值分析等理論知識，同時也會結合工程進度控管軟體應用技術。本課程目標意在培養同學具備工程進度規劃與控制觀念知識，並透過專案練習及軟體操作讓同學具備工程進度規劃與控制能力。
description.en: Construction project scheduling and control is necessary and important for effective management of construction projects. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for construction project schedule scheduling and control. The course includes plan and analysis of ADM and PDM networks, analysis of critical paths,, plan for catch-up, introduction of PERT and earned value analysis methods. The course will teach students the major concept and methods of construction project scheduling and control. Furthermore, the course will enhance students abilities and techniques integrated with project practices and project schedule software uses.

description.zh: 隨著衛星資料的取得變得更為容易，衛星遙測在各領域的應用在近年來變得更為廣泛。本課程將從遙測之基本概念開始介紹，接著介紹常用的衛星資料來源，最後本課程將簡介在土木與環工領域的衛星遙測應用。本課程一半以上的時間將為實作，學生將熟習在遙測分析軟體上分析真正的衛星資料，並在學期末遞交對自選主題之一研究報告。
description.en: The applications of satellite remote sensing data in various fields have been popular with the increase of selections of satellite data sources in recent years. This course will start with basic concepts of remote sensing, then introduce popular satellite data sources. In the end, the course will introduce applications of satellite data in the field of civil and environmental engineering. More than 50% of the class time will be hands-on. Students will have the opportunity to work on actual satellite data. At the end of the semester, students will need to submit a research report on topics chosen by students.

name.zh: 土木與環工之衛星遙測應用與實作
name.en: Applications of Satellite Remote Sensing in Civil and Environmental Engineering with labs

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。

Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

description.zh: 本課程以聽力訓練為基礎，藉由對不同情境對話培養英文聽力，亦盼讓學生增加字彙量。透過持續的練習和多樣性的活動—像是小組討論，影片和角色扮演，讓學生進一步了解如何掌握聽力技巧。
description.en: This course aims to help students develop their listening skills in different situations. This is a listening-based course, and through listening to different dialogues, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion, video-watching and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use listening skills.

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 1.科技創新與策略2.研究與創新手法3.研發流程設計4.研發流程管理5.新產品開發6.設計審查7.設計研究8.研發策略9.品質機能展開10.品質企劃11.成本企劃12.技術企劃13.資料庫建立
description.en: 1.Technology, innovation and strategy2.Research and innovation method3.Research and development process design4.Research and development process control5.New product development6.Design review7.Design research8.Research and development strategy9.Quality functional development, QFD10.Quality design11.Cost design12.Technology design13.Research and development database

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study、Paper discuss.

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 本課程旨在增進電機工程研究所學生對行動電話通訊網路工程實務之了解與分析設計之實作能力，期望學生之所學能與產業科技發展的脈動同步。 內容主要包括： (一) 電信基本概要簡介 (二) 行動電話通訊系統之演進與發展 (三) 蜂巢式行動電話基本網路架構與功能 (四) 臺灣GSM網路運作實例研討 (五) 無線網路之規劃設計與工程實務 (1)信號涵蓋之電腦模擬與路測技術 (2)通話流量與系統容量分析 (3)頻率規劃與干擾研究 (六) 系統優化與網路維運管理實務 (七) 電信公司營運機房與網管中心實地參觀 (八) 射頻規劃之電腦軟體模擬實驗: 在系裡經費許可之前提下提供學生實習網路規劃。
description.en: This course aims to improve EE graduate student's knowledge in mobile telecommunication networks with emphasis on the engineering practice, as well as to train the students to be able to design and analyze the mobile telecommunication networks. The course content includes the following: (1) Fundamentals of Telecommunications (2) Mobile telecom systems evolution and future trend (3) Cellular network structure and functions (4) Taiwan GSM networks case study (5) Wireless networks planning, design and engineering practice 1. RF planning: computer simulation and road test 2. Traffic and capacity analysis 3. Frequency planning and interference study (6) System optimization and network management (7) Site-visiting to Telecomm company's operation center (8) Planning/design simulation using computer software if funding is allowed.

name.zh: 行動通訊網路原理與實務
name.en: Mobile Telecommunication Networks Principles and Practice

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 介紹審計準則與查核報告、職業道德、專業責任的保持：查核人員的監管和法律責任、審計證據、審計業務承接、內部控制、資訊科技環境下的審計、審計抽樣的應、查核工作底稿、收入循環、採購支出及付款循環等。 本課程參考最新國際準則公報並依照現行教學及考試方向調整原有架構之外，更針對鑑識審計、公司治理、審計業務承接、查帳和客戶之間的關係、風險評估以及資訊科技環境下的審計等做了更多的著墨，而近更動之審計公報也於本版一併進行更新，以求更符合趨勢。
description.en: Introduction auditing standards and audit report, maintaining professional ethics, professional responsibility: the regulatory and legal responsibility to check personnel, audit evidence, audit business undertaking, internal control, information technology audit environment, audit sampling should be to check the working papers, income circulation, procurement spending and payment cycle and so on. The course reference to the latest international standards and adjust the original architecture communique teaching and examination in accordance with current direction, it is more for the forensic audit, corporate governance, auditing business undertaking, under the audit and the relationship between the customer, risk assessment and information technology environment audit done more inked, and audit bulletin of recent changes in this edition also be updated in order to be more consistent with the trend.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一、二年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman and Sophomore students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 分子模擬是一種廣泛應用在各工程領域的研究工具。針對研究目標的現象及材料，將巨觀尺度的系統映射到微觀尺度，以其組成原子和分子建立模型。模型內的原子則依循力場相互作用，於電腦上高速運算。所收集到的數據，透過統計力學的分析，可預測目標系統的巨觀性質。以此方法得到的資訊，可指引後期實驗開發的方向，以加速研發的進程並減少實驗的浪費。本課程旨在介紹常見的分子模擬理論和技巧，並協助各領域的同學對其專業問題進行實作。
description.en: Molecular simulation provides research guidelines and fundamental understandings for studying engineering problems and designing novel materials. The target material is modelled by a microscopic system which is constructed in the atomistic level. The simulations for such system are carried out on the computers based on the applied force field, and generate information that can be used in the future design. This course introduces the basic theories and tools in modern molecular simulations. Students from different majors can formulate simulation problems based on their expertise and interests.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

notes: ◎丙組選修/陳盈君/機電、機械外生班和機電博班合開

description.zh: 本課程將講述人體動作分析所需之理論知識及實驗量測設備原理。課程內容包括運動學及動力學基本原理:平移和旋轉、座標系的坐標轉換、尤拉角、線速度、線加速度、角速度、角加速度之求法。動力學著重於利用逆向動力學計算各關節力，力矩和功率。課程中亦將介紹動作分析系統之各項元件及資料處理方法。
description.en: This course introduces the basic theories and the measurement equipments for performing human motion analysis. The course contents will include topics on Kinematics and Kinetics: translation and rotation, coordinate system transformation, Euler angles, linear velocity and acceleration, angular velocity and acceleration, inverse dynamics, joint moment and power. The basic components of human motion analysis system and the data processing methods will also be described.

description.zh: 虛擬實境是一種藝術與科技的整合，廣泛運用在不同屬性的領域，如飛行模擬器、醫療檢測設備、成品預覽等。本虛擬實境應用之課程內容，將專注於虛擬實境應用對於未來科技、生活等不同層面的影響，同時探討沈浸、想像、互動與人類心理認知的相互關係。課程內容包含幾何式虛擬實境、影像式虛擬實境、混合式虛擬實境等。
description.en: Virtual reality (VR) is an integration of art and technology. It is widely used in fields that are very different in nature such as aviation simulator, medical inspection equipment, preview of finished products, etc. This course will focus on the impact of VR application in the future technology and lifestyles as well as explore the relationships among engrossment, imagination, interaction, and human psychological cognition. The course content includes graphic-based VR, imaged-based VR, and hybrid VR.

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構

description.zh: 本課程將介紹使用於智慧家庭、智慧製造與智慧醫療應用的感測器結構與基本工作原理，包含光學感測原理、半導體感測原理、機械感測原理、化學感測原理、生物感測原理、各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計與近期的感測技術基礎科學發展與議題。
description.en: This course introduces the sensor structure and basic working principles used in smart home, smart manufacturing and smart medical applications, including optical sensors, semiconductor sensors, mechanical sensors, electrochemical sensors, biosensors. Moreover, we will discuss various sensor measurement systems, conversion interface circuit design, and recent scientific development."

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies the theory of thermaldynamics to calculate chemical potential energy andits equilibrium of condensed phase, released pressure and activated factors, solutionthermaldynamics, complex metal solution , phase diagram and phase change,computer-aided phase reaction and phase diagram simulation, and planning amathmatics model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 工程地質學為地質科學之應用學門之一，本課程之內容在介紹工程地質的一般關念及基本原理，包括工程地質學導論、工程工址調查重點、工程地質中之材料因素、岩體中之弱面、地質作用的動力與岩石之褶皺、工程地質之計量化及其應用、工程地質在自然邊坡穩定之應用、各種自然岩石與土壤之簡介、工程地質在水庫工程之應用、工程地質在壩工之應用、工程地質在隧道工程之應用、工址調查之目的方法與程序、工程地質圖簡介、地質鑽探與現地試驗、工程地質中之環境因素等部份。
description.en: This course of Engineering Geology is designed as an upper-division course for undergraduate geology majors and graduate students, with an emphasis on construction or environmental concerns. Also enrolled are civil engineers with a background in geology and those who are interested in geologic applications to construction. The course builds on a basic knowledge of geology by relating geology to engineering fundamentals and construction concepts. The topics of this course include 1.Origin and development of the earth, 2.Introduction to the Engineering Geology, 3.Elements of Rock and Soil Mechanics, 4.Engineering properties of rocks, 5.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.The weak planes in the rock body, 7.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.Geologic hazards, 7.The rock mass classification and rating, 8.Landslides, subsidence, and slope stability, 9.Site investigation, 10.Case study in the Engineering Geology

notes: 材資三、四乙合開，由新聘老師授課

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

description.zh: 由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性(de-terrorization)的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施(infrastructure)的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性(alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的"實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分:全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築/地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en: In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程強調全方位的國際商用英語溝通。現今各領域上之商業活動多以英語進行，因此本課程注重發展學生以英語文進行流暢之溝通的關鍵能力，特別強調商業組織內外部常見的正式溝通之形式，包括商用英語寫作、簡報與會議技巧。課時也納入非正式溝通技巧，指導學生學習應對職場情境，因應相關之溝通需求。
description.en: This current course emphasizes a holistic view of business communication in a global context.  Given that business communication across from fields of business activities is now made possible by the English language, the course thus aims to develop the ability to use critical skills essential to successful communication in English, with particular emphases on forms of formal communications that are highly visible within and outside business organizations, including writing of business correspondence and reports, presentations and meetings. Informal communication skills are also incorporated to address workplace situations to identify the relevant communication needs.

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.en: The course explores the intersection of the English language communication and cases in real business world.  Each case to be discussed in this course illustrates the many aspects of business operations and provides students with the opportunities to examine, to analyze and to present their views in English. The emphasis of the course is two-fold. While reinforcing the importance of business communications in English and enhancing students' analytical competence in discussing the cases, real-world business stories reflect a multitude of challenges to resolve and opportunities to embrace in hopes that students are well-prepare to cope with all these in the future to come.  As the course prescribes, students are required to have an advanced English level and fundamental business knowledge.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.
