The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

notes: 創創向度  共科地下演講廳

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

description.zh: 從歷史之反省中，探索人類對未來之創造潛力。詮釋競爭與和諧，個人與國家，現實與理想之雙軌教學，期能栽培專業人力與宏觀之人材。啟發學生比較歸納、以古鑑今的思維能力，使之獲得客觀有用的歷史學識。
description.en: This course is designed to help students explore human creative potential for the future in the light of historical introspection.  This course is an interactive instruction on the following topics: competition vs. harmony, individual vs. nation, reality vs. ideality.  Emphasis will be placed on training students' logical reasoning in analysis, synthesis, comparison, induction, and deduction so that they can acquire useful historical knowledge in an objective way.  In so doing, we hope to cultivate perspective professional intellects.

description.zh: 何謂法國文化？文化對法國人而言代表了生活，每一分每一秒法國人都在創造編織文化，生活的點點滴滴具體象徵法蘭西文化與民族特性。隨著歐盟的成立與運作，地域文化的發展，東西歐文化交流與非歐洲移民文化的包容，再加上法國文化政策以發展地方文化為標的，使得20世紀的法國文化有別於過去的面貌。本課程將不同主題以單元方式探討，學習者可由中認識、了解法國文化的多元、形成方式，進而分辨與其它文化的差異點。此外，學習者需要自備主題參與討論、探討。主題準備方式是以在既有的書面或官方網站資料中衍生個人創意與想像力。
description.en: What is French Culture? For the French people, culture represents daily life, every minute and second the French is creating and weaving their culture, thus strengthening the symbol of French Culture and its identity. With the establishment and development of the European Union, France underwent a phase of decentralization and immigration; greatly influencing and changing the visage of 20the century French culture from before. Therefore, this course aims to stimulate discussion of the chapters through different subjects. Through this method, the students will be able to recognize and understand more about the diversity and formation of French culture; in addition, they will be capable of telling the differences between French culture and other cultures. During this course, the students are required to choose a subject to discuss and research. Note that in preparation of their final orientation, the information within must be based on photocopied texts or official websites in order to d

description.zh: 本課程的特色是希望藉由管弦樂音樂的播放，與實體樂器的展示、示範演出，互相結合，使同學在欣賞高水準的音樂之餘，更能實際接觸到平常接觸不到的實體樂器，實際的觀察樂器的構造，近距離的欣賞到樂器，能聽到實際上發出的聲音，從而對材料機械，科技與樂器聲響之間的關係，有一個真實而全新的認識，進而引發對音樂的認識以及興趣。
description.en: The feature of the course is that, through playing music, physical instrument display an demonstration of performances, the students come into contact with the usual musical instruments. Observing the instrument configuration and listening the sound in close distance lead to a true and a new understanding of the relationship between material mechanics and musical sound, and thus trigger and interest in music.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en: "Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 我國是個高度仰賴國際貿易的國家, 如何將國內各大大小小的工廠所生產製造的品質優良產品向全世界推廣行銷一直都是各產業界極為重視的目標, 也是各級政府重要的施政措施之一, 更是國內各大專院校等高等學府會精心安排的教學課程.本課程著重如何創業成立一家從事外銷的國際貿易公司, 協助本國產業推廣產品至國際市場
description.en: As we know, Taiwan which highly rely on international trade. How to achieve a perfect promotion to the worldwide are all important goal  for no matter who producing high quality big group enterprise or small factory,  the government taking into policy with highly concern, several college arranging curricular.

notes: 創創向度 綜二演講廳

description.zh: 現代人的健康問題50％以上導因於生活型態與行為模式，傳統以疾病治療為主的醫療模式已無法因應目前民眾的健康需求，健康促進、危急救護等觀念正被廣泛應用，本課程內容包含三大部分，包括「健康及其影響因素」、「健康促進相關議題」、「安全教育與急救」，藉由系統性健康教育與資訊傳播，使學生能習得正確健康知能及技能，幫助學生建立健康行為模式，使其健康能獲得更好的自我控制。
description.en: More than 50% of modern men’s health problems attributes from living style and behavior. The tradition way for curing illness has failed to fulfill people’s requirements. Conceptions such as health promoting and emergencies dealing are now being wildly used. This course mainly focuses on three issues, including “health and its affected cause,” “related issues on health promotion”, and “safety education and emergency treatment.” Through systematical health education and information spreading, students acquire the correct health knowledge and skills, to help students lead a healthy life and to get a better self-control on own health.

description.zh: 現代科技文明進展得非常迅速，這使得一般人日常生活中，可能經常享受到這些科技所帶來的便利，但卻習以為常，以為天生下來就是這樣的，這些現代的科技，可能是關於電機的、物理的、化工的、光電的、材料的......，更有可能同時涉及了其他許多個領域，更可能有許多人希望能夠了解這些科技的來龍去脈，一窺其究竟，人類在沒有土木工程學之前，早已能建築萬里長城和金字塔，許許多多的科技是由嘗試錯誤，經驗的累積逐漸得來的，當然，隨著知識的不斷窮究其理，"知而後行"的高科技也就會越來越多，我們在這裡也試圖去追蹤各項科技的演進史與現況方面讓大家知道羅馬不是一天所造成的，另一方面也讓大家有從另一個角度重新思考的機會，也許這些科技進化到現在，還稱不上成熟的階段，您也許可以找出另一種更好的方法來改進它們！
description.en: Modern technology is growing fast. People thus enjoy the convenience in company with the technology—which they do and they just take it for granted to do. It may have something to do with electrical engineering, physics, chemical engineering, electro-optical engineering, materials…Some problems involves more than one field. People are curious about the technology and willing to know how to solve the problems. Human beings are able to build the pyramids and the Long Walls before they know anything about civil engineering—knowledge actually piled up by trial and error or accumulated experience. As knowledge expands, hi-end technology which requires “know-how” becomes more popular. In this course, we try to trace the history and the current situations: “Rome was not built in a day.” On the other hand, we might take another chance to RE-think a deeper problem: technology evolves without getting to maturity. Human beings will be enforced to find some other ways to improve it.

description.zh: 小說是文學中重要的一支，而短篇小說更是利用最經濟的文學手段以塑造人物形象，反映社會現實的一種藝術。我國的短篇小說，自唐至清，代有佳作，故本課程即以歷代傑出作品為範疇，選擇最具代表性的篇章，透過閱讀及討論之方式，對其做多層面之探討，以期使受教者能在宏觀方面瞭解其所反映之當代文化及歷史價值，在微觀方面則能欣賞其所體現的文學藝術，最終並能掌握課堂所學，觸類旁通，施用於其他相關領域之學習。
description.en: Fiction is one of the important genres of literature. The novelette is regarded as the most effective means to depict people and reflect the society. From Tan Dynastic to Chiang Dynastic, Chinese classical novelette abounded with great works of fiction. This course aims to introduce some representative works of Chinese classical novelettes. By reading and discussing works of novelettes, we can understand their social background and their value in history in macro view and enjoy their beauty of literature forms in micro view. Students can apply what they learned in this course to their specific field of study.

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 「社會心理學」主要探討的重點在於日常生活，社會刺激以及情境如何影響個人行為，它需要經過科學的方法進行研究，藉以預測一個人在某種情境下，可能會出現哪些行為。其涉及的學科相當廣泛，除了一般心理學的理論之外，尚包含社會科學哲學、文化人類學、倫理學、環境心理學、團體動力學等相關論述。課程強調理論與實務結合，提升學生參與社會的知能。
description.en: Social Psychology is focus on social stimuli and how situations affect individual behavior everyday life. In order to predict a person’s behavior in a situation, we need to research by scientific methods.  It covers a wide range of professional areas, not only the theories of social psychology but also philosophy of social science, cultural anthropology, ethics, environmental psychology, group dynamics. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice to enhance students’ abilities to participate in society.

description.zh: 管理者必須具有優良的領導能力，才能成為優秀的管理者。本課程介紹領導理論、領導架構、權力應用及授權原則，領導者如何進行團隊領導、變革領導。並在組織內發生衝突時，如何進行衝突管理。在遇到部門內工作士氣低落時，如何激勵部屬以提升部屬士氣。並以相關領導個案進行討論，使學習者能模擬實務情形以學習如何領導。對於理工科系人員，具有優良技術能力，在擔任主管之後能如能有良好的領導能力，即可成為一位卓越的主管。本課程為增強主管領導能力的重要課程之一。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to become good managers. This course introduces the leadership theory, leadership structure, authority application and principles of delegation, groups leading and transformational leadership. Also, this course covers the conflict management when conflict occurs in the group.Apart from that, the course also discuss about how to motivate subordinates to boost the morale of subordinates in the face of low morale in the department. The class uses relevant leader cases for discussion, for students to simulate practical situations in order to learn how to lead. For scientists and engineers with excellent technical abilities, will become an excellent supervisor, if they work as directors with good leadership skills. This course is one of the important courses to enhance the ability of competent leadership.

notes: 社哲向度，課程配合USR計畫

description.zh: 使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en: Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

notes: 美學向度  綜二演講廳

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 本課程名稱為 “環境與自然保育” 。它包括二大範疇：(1)自然環境和自然資源的保育，(2)自然環境的保存、維護、利用、復原及改良。它將教導學生下列主題：自然保育的基本概念（自然保育的定義、自然保育觀念的發展）、保育生物學（物種形成和滅絕、生物多樣性、物種保護的優先原則、生物入侵）、生態經濟學簡介（生態經濟學的原則、能量流與物質流分析）、自然保護區（自然保護區之概念、自然保護區的保護對象）、自然保育政策（國際自然保育策略、台灣的自然保育機構及相關法規）與自然保育運動（自然保育運動之發展、當前自然保育運動所關心的事）。整體而言, 本課程期盼提升公民生態意識和環境覺知, 使大家對環境保育做出更多貢獻。
description.en: The title of this course is “Environment and Nature Conservation”. It includes two categories: (1) conservation of the natural environment and natural resources, and (2) the preservation, maintenance, restoration and improvement of the natural environment. It will introduce to students the following themes: basic concepts of nature conservation, conservation biology, introduction to ecological economics, nature reservation, nature conservation policy, and nature conservation movement. As a whole, it aims to raise our citizens’ ecological consciousness and environmental awareness and thus enable them to make more contribution to the conservation of our environment.

description.zh: 台灣科技發展史將討論二十世紀前半（1900-1950）部份重要技術引入台灣後，造成的影響與社會變遷。依時間先後，先從農業技術的變革-綠色革命。其次研讀有關電力與水利的技術發展，然後進入工業化初期的台灣社會變遷，以及二次大戰期間軍需工業所引導出的初期重化工業。除了這些技術與產業變革之外，也將兼論及技術人物群像與職業教育的開端。
description.en: The main topics for class will discuss the important technology how to influence Taiwan society during 1900-1950. This class includes some important developments: Green revolution -it discuss about agriculture development; the technology development of electricity and water conservancy. In some topic we discuss about Taiwan society change in early days industrialization and chemical industry during world war II. Except those topics, technologists and the beginning of professional education in Taiwan will be introduced.

name.en: The Development of Taiwan Technology History

description.zh: 透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

notes: 創創向度,與北醫語言中心黃湘玲主任合授

description.zh: 服務創新是利用新的設想、新的技術手段轉變成更新並且改進過後的服務方式。從社會的角度而言，服務創新是創造和開發人類自身價值,提高和完善生存質量，改善社會生態環境的活動。因此，服務創新通過滿足物質需求、精神和心理需求，並提供解決問題的能力，保障人們的精神和心理上的健康，得到滿足感和成就感。 本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何提供改善對人類的服務。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為服務創新與創業概念啟發，介紹世界各國服務創新創業實例與模範；服務創新的思路。第二部份在辨別服務創新市場機會與發展市場，介紹新興市場，服務創新能做甚麼第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to run a start-up company which has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion.The course includes three parts: Part I build students’ concept about service innovation and entrepreneurship.Part II is about service innovation market identification. Part III is about service marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resou

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

description.zh: 「社會心理學」主要探討的重點在於日常生活，社會刺激以及情境如何影響個人行為，它需要經過科學的方法進行研究，藉以預測一個人在某種情境下，可能會出現哪些行為。其涉及的學科相當廣泛，除了一般心理學的理論之外，尚包含社會科學哲學、文化人類學、倫理學、環境心理學、團體動力學等相關論述。課程強調理論與實務結合，提升學生參與社會的知能。
description.en: Social Psychology is focus on social stimuli and how situations affect individual behavior everyday life. In order to predict a person’s behavior in a situation, we need to research by scientific methods.  It covers a wide range of professional areas, not only the theories of social psychology but also philosophy of social science, cultural anthropology, ethics, environmental psychology, group dynamics. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice to enhance students’ abilities to participate in society.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 本課程是教授學生人工智慧的基本概念與應用，激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、人工智慧的製造業應用、人工智慧的服務業應用。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of artificial intelligence and to inspire students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learning, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industrial applications of artificial intelligence, and services applications of artificial intelligence.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

notes: 美學向度   綜二演講廳

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 學習相似於Microsoft Power Point 的「拖-拉-點-選」操作方式，再加上一小部份的 Low Code程式編碼，即可以設計與製作出:「專業級的 APP」 !本課程運用學校內的雲端平台: AgilePoint NX，改變了以往撰寫APP 的模式，不再需要撰寫複雜的程式碼，讓學生專注於 APP的邏輯流程與UI(使用者介面)，進而發展貼近市場裡的商業模式，設計出精彩的APP!課程的教學，採用傳統臺北工專的黑手工程師訓練模式:「由經入史」:先講解理論架構，進而延伸到產業的實務運用。嚴格要求上課同學動手實做，達成每週的設定目標。課堂上講師所示範的範例非常豐富，下課後會有一定份量的Homework(實作型作業)。經此系統化訓練，在APP的設計與製作上，將擁有踏實的內涵與技術，增強在校學生，未來在職場上的競爭力。「讓不懂IT(資訊工程)、非理工背景的學生，更能設計出高人氣的APP! 」
description.en: Learn the "Click and Drag" operation method, as like Microsoft Power Point, and adds some Low-Code, you can design and create: "Professional APP"!This course uses the cloud platform in the school: AgilePoint NX, which changes the mode of writing APP in the past, no longer needs to write complex code, let students focus on the logic flow of the APP and UI (user interface), and then close to the market requirement. This course uses the Taipei Tech Practical-Engineer training method:"From Theory to Practical": First explain the theoretical structure, and then extend to the practical application of the industry.Strictly ask the trainees to do it, and achieve the weekly set goals. The examples demonstrated by the lecturers in the class are very rich, and there will be a certain amount of Homework after the class.Through this systematic training, in the design and production of APP, we will have practical connotation and technology to enhance the competitiveness of students in coll

name.en: Start to APP Design and Application

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

notes: 美學向度 綜二演講廳

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 近百年是台灣政治、社會、經濟、文化劇烈變動的時代。從清季西洋勢力的大舉進入，清廷推動自強新政以應變；爾後台灣淪入殖民統治，在近代化及同化政策下台灣的變革更為迅速；而從台灣光復迄今，不論是經濟發展、政治民主、教育普及等等，使台灣進入已開發國家之林。這些變革與發展，是台灣民眾集體努力的總成績，但其間也有許多引領風騷的人物，他們分佈於各個不同的領域，歷史家對他們的評價或正或負，成就與貢獻的多寡也有爭議，不過透過這些人物事蹟的探討，可了解個人與群體、時代、環境的互動關係，也更能掌握近百年台灣史發展的脈絡。
description.en: Never has Taiwan experienced so big changes in politics, social structures, economics and cultural movements as in the last century. In Ching Dynasty, the Westernized power entered and the Ching court initiated innovative campaigns to work against; then Taiwan under the colonial rule by Japan, modernization  and colonialism changes Taiwan a lot ; in past half century KMT's rule has advanced such great deal in the fields of economic development, democracy and education as to stand among the developed countries. Though it is the collective efforts of the Taiwanese people that contribute to the alteration and development, there exist some of the outstanding figures in various fields, who might receive positive as well as negative comments from the historians and who might initiate a controversy concerning their contribution. This course explores the most influential individuals and the events that happen around, in the hope to understand the interaction between each of them and the groups

description.zh: 本課程由全球化框架來檢視兩岸關係的演進、現況、及發展趨勢。由政治、經濟、乃至社會心理層面分析海峽兩岸錯綜複雜的互動關係。並檢視國際政治經濟體系中，美國與日本兩大國對兩岸關係的影響。
description.en: This introductory course on the complex cross-strait interactions will examineTaiwan’s role in the intricate web of international power politics; as well as the structure of hegemonic power rivalry, particularly Sino-US-Japan triangle, and its impact on cross strait relations. The material will cover the evolution, status quo, and developmental path of the cross strait relations in a global framework.

name.en: Cross Strait Relations and International Politics

notes: 法治向度  綜二演講廳

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 運動、營養與健康是目前先進國家相當關注之理念與課題，也是提升生活品質與開發個人潛能的有效方法。本課程將有系統的介紹健康的生活方式與規律適度的運動，並將著重於如何將運動學與營養學之學理與技術，適當應用於個體健康生活整體之營造，使修課學生能了解運動前後的均衡飲食與擁有健康。
description.en: Exercise, nutrition and health is very concerned about the idea of advanced countries and issues, but also an effective way to develop individual potential and quality of life improved. This course will introduce a healthy lifestyle with moderate exercise system of law, and will focus on how the theoretical and technical kinematics and nutrition, the proper individuals applied to create a healthy life as a whole, so that students can enjoy the sport taught , and have a healthy balanced diet.

description.zh: 在本課程中，同學將學習到計算機程式語言Python基礎與應用，建立Python程式設計的基本概念。透過做中學、學中做，建構程式設計的基礎，以及基本程式運算邏輯，以培養運算思維、動手做的能力。期末以分組方式完成一個與學生專業領域相關應用的專題，學習如何運用程式解決與自身相關領域運用上的問題。
description.en: In this course, students will learn the basics and applications of the Python programming language and establish the basic concepts of Python programming design. Through the continuous practice, student will construct the basic logic of the program design, and the ability of computation think and practice application. At the final, a topic related to the application of students' professional subjects will be completed in groups, and student will learn how to use the program to solve problems in the relevant fields.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, and Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓同學學習顯示面板相關的理論與瞭解先關產業動向；除了透過產業導師的教導與實地工廠的見習，讓同學在最短的時間內對現今顯示面板產業有初步的認識；此外，本課程內容也包含各種液晶原件的製作與相關光電特性的量測與應用，藉此訓練修課同學能成為顯示面板的初階人才。
description.en: The course will introduce the principle of display panel and let students to know the industry dynamics. The students can get preliminary knowledge of the display panel industry with less time by the teaching from industrial mentor and the practice at factory.  In addition, the students will also learn how to produce various LC devices and measure the electro-optical properties or practically apply of these produce devices.  Thus, the students will become a junior talent of display panel market after training of this course.

notes: 部份週次至友達工廠整天實作,光電二三四合開,限15

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：1.電磁波光學2.高斯光束3.共振腔理論4. 原子輻射5.雷射與放大器原理7.雷射特性 8.雷射的應用
description.en: This course introduces: 1. Electromagnetic Optics 2.Gaussian Beams 3.Optical resonators 4.Atomic radiation 5.Principles of lasers and amplifiers 6. General characteristics of lasers 7. Laser applications

notes: ◎光電三四及電資外生班合開

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 高階光學鏡頭是目前探索太空、發展醫療及曝光設備極為重要的關鍵技術，此技術可應用到生活各項領域，包括：拍照攝影、星空宇宙探索、智慧監控及商用鏡頭(望遠鏡、相機和顯微鏡)等。本課程主要授課內容針對工程背景學生跨領域選修，以瞭解奈米級精度系統設計、製造、檢測、組裝及驗證。為使學習效果顯著成效，除了以講授方式闡述重要基礎觀念外，選修學生將實際製作產品及最終上台報告，使課程學以致用為本課程最大宗旨。
description.en: High-end optical lenses are leading edge technology for the medicine, semiconductor, mobile phone, surveillance, machine vision, and space industry. This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them. All the selected students in this course are required to report their results on the stage in the final examination.

name.zh: 光機電系統概論與實務製造
name.en: Introduction to optical electromechanical system and manufacturing technology

notes: 光電二三四研及電資外生二合開，限20人

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 博士必修,碩士選修不計畢業學分,老師腳不便請排1樓

description.zh: 台灣位處東南亞與東北亞島弧的中介點，是亞洲大陸與太平洋的接點，因此，歷來有許多不同族群移居，因而形成多彩多樣的多元價值觀並容兼蓄的文化觀。本課程將論述介紹台灣南島文化、荷西殖民時期的基督教、漢人文化、日本文化和近代文明等在台灣社會產生的影響。
description.en: The island of Taiwan is located in the middle of the island arc of Southeastern and Northeastern Asia. Further, it is the intersection of the Asian continent and the Pacific Ocean. Since many different ethnic groups have migrated in together, a multi-dimensional view of value-colorful in itself has thus been formed. This course will make a first-step introduction and discussion on the impact over the Taiwan society processed by the cultural mix of the Austronesians, the Christianity under the occupation of the Netherlands and Spain, the Hans, the Japanese and the modern civilization.

name.en: The History and Culture of Taiwan

description.zh: 歷史相關研究蓬勃發展迄今，不論是史料或新舊的研究著作重新被重視、翻譯與詮釋，這些可稱之為史學著作的經典。這些書籍既有趣味又有意義，捧而讀之，中西歷史、古往今來的風物民情、地貌變遷等流轉仿彿躍於紙上。本課程將介紹這些經典的、趣味的、有意義的歷史名著，藉由數本好書，進而瞭解人類的歷史。
description.en: Since the study of the history has been in prosperity, a large number of historical texts have been newly translated and interpreted, thus gaining more importance. These texts can be categorized as classical volumes of history . There have been existent a lot of other written resources interesting and meaningful exhibiting the vivid image of the people, geography, folk stories and the transition of time available in history. This course focuses on these particular materials concerning the human history through the discussion of which, the history of mankind can be better understood.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1.知識發現與資料探勘概論 2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3.資料處理技術 4.教導型學習方法 5.教導型學習方法 6.關聯法則探勘 7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用。
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

name.en: Research and Practices of Data Mining

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解物聯網 (Internet of Things)的本基概念及其所應用的各種技術。本課程包含(1)簡介(2)物聯網的基本架構及其關鍵技術，(3)物聯網感知層及其應用技術，(4)物聯網感網路層及其應用技術，(5)物聯網應用層及其應用技術，(6)無線感測網路工作原理及實習，(7)RFID工作原理及實習。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the basic concepts and applied technologies in the field of Internet of Things. The main subjects of this course include :(1) Introduction .(2)The basic structure of Internet of Things and it key technologies.(3) The device layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies. (4)The connect layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(5)The application layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(6)The principle and practice of wireless sensor network.(7) The principle and practice of RFID.

name.en: Applied Technology of the Internet of Things

description.zh: 近年來，因為類神經網路和模糊邏輯系統具有universal approximation的特性，其應用到控制器設計問題中，都有不錯的結果。一般來說，類神經網路和模糊邏輯系統最主要被拿來當作非線性函數的近似器。因此適應性模糊類神經控制器的設計可分為兩大類：第一類為非直接適應性模糊類神經控制的設計方法，第二類為直接適應性模糊類神經控制的設計方法。前者是直接以類神經網路或模糊邏輯系統來近似非線性系統的非線性項(函數)，產生與真實系統近似的模型，利用此模型設計各種不同功能的控制器。顧名思義，"非直接"就是類神經網路或模糊邏輯系統不是直接用來當作控制器使用。後者是直接以類神經網路或模糊邏輯系統來當作控制器，針對非線性系統設計控制器，特別是具不確定性的非線性系統，此方法特別有效。內容包含：(1) 介紹，(2) 模糊邏輯系統，(3) 模糊類神經網路，(4) 訓練法則，(5) 穩定非直接適應性模糊類神經控制，(6) 穩定直接適應性模糊類神經控制，(7) 估測器為基礎之適應性模糊類神經控制，(8) 應用。
description.en: This course covers important concepts and topics in fuzzy logic systems and neural networks to serve as controllers with adaptive learning algorithms. The controlled systems are nonlinear uncertain systems.  The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Fuzzy logic systems, (3) Fuzzy Neural Networks, (4) Training Algorithms, (5) Stable Indirect Adaptive Fuzzy Neural Control, (6) Stable Direct Adaptive Fuzzy Neural Control, (7) Observer-Based Adaptive Fuzzy Neural Control, (8) Applications and Projects.

name.zh: 適應性模糊類神經控制

description.zh: 離岸風力發電是在海上建設風力發電廠，電廠通常建於大陸礁層(棚)，利用風能進行發電，它較陸上風力發電具有更高的風速，所以能提供更多的電力。面對全球溫室氣體減量趨勢與達成非核家園願景，政府已規劃2025年再生能源發電占比20％之政策目標，為達成此一政策目標，政府規劃以太陽光電及離岸風電作為主力，其中離岸風力原規劃於2025年累計達3 GW（10億瓦）。為了讓學生了解離岸風力發電熱流與空氣動力學之基本原理與應用，特別於大四與研究所共同合開這門課。本課程內容主要包括:(1)離岸風電簡介，(2)流體力學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(3)熱傳學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(4)空氣動力學基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(5)電腦輔助離岸風機之氣動分析。
description.en: Offshore wind power is the use of wind farms constructed in bodies of water, usually in the ocean on the continental shelf, to harvest wind energy to generate electricity. Higher wind speeds are available offshore compared to on land, so offshore wind power’s electricity generation is higher per amount of capacity installed. In the face of the trend of global greenhouse gas reduction and the realization of the non-nuclear homeland vision, the government has planned a policy goal of renewable energy generation in the proportion of 20% in 2025. In order to achieve this policy goal, the government plans to use solar photovoltaic and offshore wind power as its main force. Among them, offshore wind power was originally planned to reach 3 GW (1 billion watts) in 2025. To assist students to understand the principle and application of thermo-fluid and aerodynamics on offshore wind power, this course is opened for seniors of undergraduate students and graduate students. The main content includ

name.zh: 離岸風電之熱流與空氣動力學基礎
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of Thermo-Fluid and Aerodynamics on Offshore Wind Power

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

notes: ◎能源所和能源與車輛外生合開

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 本課程將延續財務工程導論的內容，將持續在債券與衍生性商品評價、避險以及風險控管等問題上繼續深入探討；本學期將把焦點放在債券投資的避險、股票衍生性商品與利率衍生性商品的評價與避險上，並利用C(或C++)和Matlab兩種工具來執行樹狀結構，以評價選擇權的價值。
description.en: This course will still focus on the methods for bond and derivatives pricing and hedging, such as the evaluation of stock and bond options. For implementation purposes associated with the concepts introduced, such as the tree structure, two programming languages for computation will be provided: C (or C++ ) and Matlab.

notes: 資財三甲、三乙合開/科研240教室

description.zh: 網路行銷包含資訊技術與行銷觀念，這門課希望融合者兩面的觀點，在使同學了解網路行銷的理論與實務，輔以資料分析之技術，介紹目前常用的推薦系統、客戶分群等行銷資料分析，此外，也輔以期刊論文的研讀來加強同學的學術理論基礎。
description.en: E-Marketing involves information technology and marketing. The course will explore information technology/systems concepts from a non-technical perspective and examine how the marketing function is influenced by emerging technology trends. In addition, some famous e-marketing technique would be introduced in this course including recommender system, customer segmentation and so on.  This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical bases

notes: ◎資財四甲、IMBA&IMFI&資財所&管理博班合開

description.zh: 金融科技是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到法律方面。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技與專利、商標、著作權、營業秘密及之間的關係、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要金融科技公司發展做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
description.en: FinTech is an emerging field. It will apply to many commercial fields. FinTech is not only in financial field, but also in legal field. This course will discuss the relationship between Finance, patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret and fair trading act. It also includes FinTech application and business model of famous FinTech companies. Case study is important in this course.

name.zh: 金融科技智慧財產權的管理與應用
name.en: Application of FinTech and Intellectual Property

notes: 資財三四甲、三四乙合開

description.zh: 課程會涵蓋資訊能力與財金的整合來協助學生了解 FINTEC 服務。接下來透過設計思考來帶領學生透過設計一服務創新主題，讓學生以學習到的方法工具，進行實地演練，透過發表與評價，體驗完整的創新旅程，同時建立分組的創新作品集。
description.en: The course develops practical approaches for understanding and analyzing the servie of financial technologies (FinTech). The course will use design thinking to take students through the design of the User Experience (UX) and User-Interface (UI) of a product or service of their creation.

name.zh: 金融科技與服務創新流程

description.zh: 本課程將由個人資料保護原則開始對個人資料保護作全面性的介紹，並說明《個人資料保護法》與《個人資料保護法施行細則》如何與個資保護原則互相呼應，期使學生瞭解目前個人資料保護的管理議題與實務考量，並且說明可參考的標準與指引，以強化學生對於個人資料保護的基礎概念。藉由《個人資料保護法》及《個人資料保護法施行細則》的介紹帶入ISO/IEC 29100的個資保護框架、隱私衝擊評鑑(PIA)，接下介紹ISO/IEC 27701個資保護實作指引等相關國際標準，本課程以實際的案例以及國際標準讓學生這對於個人資料保護有更進一步的概念與瞭解。
description.en: This course will begin with a comprehensive introduction to personal data protection principles and explain in detail the "Personal Data Protection Act" and the "Enforcement Rules of the Personal Data Protection Act". Student will learn managerial and practical considerations of personal data protection. Relevant standards and guidelines, such as ISO/IEC 29100, ISO/IEC 27701, will be discussed to strengthen students' understanding of fundamental concepts of personal information management systems (PIMS). In addition, the process of a privacy impact assessment (PIA) and its related standard ISO/IEC 29134 will also be introduced in this course. All in all, this course aims to give students a solid understanding of personal data protection through cases studies and international standards.

description.zh: 統計數據分析是一種利用數據對遇到問題進行適當推測的藝術(有時是最好)，本課程是一門以微積分為基礎的統計學分析的入門課程，旨在幫助學生學習描述性和推論性的統計程序，以及在不同領域中使用有用的數據分析。在回顧描述性統計和一些必要的概率分佈後，我們將討論區間估計、點估計、假說檢定方差分析、線性回歸分析、因子設計、聚類分析的基本概念、分類和支持向量機，並伴隨著實踐和理論練習。因此這些技能將為學生提供一個基礎，培養學生獨自進行分析和有效評估他人統計分析結果的能力。
description.en: ‘Statistical data analytics’ is the art of using data to make appropriate (sometimes, best!) conjectures about problems encountered. This course is a calculus-based introduction to statistics and data analytics, and so designed to help students learn the introductory descriptive and inferential statistical procedures, and useful data analytics that are used in diverse areas. After a review of descriptive statistics and some necessary probability distributions, we will discuss interval and point estimation, hypothesis tests, ANOVA, linear regression analysis, factorial designs, and basic concept of cluster analysis, classification, and support vector machines accompanying practical and theoretical exercises. Consequently, these skills will provide the student with a basis to conduct their own such analyzes and to evaluate critically others’ uses of statistical analysis results.

description.en: This course aims to help students develop their listening skills in different situations. This is a listening-based course, and through listening to different dialogues, students will be expected to improve vocabulary as well. With consistent practice and multiple activities—small-group/pair discussion, video-watching and role-playing, students will have a better understanding of how to use listening skills.

description.zh: 本課程以簡要方式介紹我國專利法，內容主要涵蓋：專利申請、可專利標的、專利要件、專利審查流程、專利權之實施、專利侵害判斷、專利檢索及專利說明書之撰寫，尚包括專利訴訟流程、專利行政救濟流程以及專利法與其他智慧財產權法關係之簡介。
description.en: This course briefly introduces the patent law of our country, which covers the filing of the patent application, patentable subject matter, patentability, patent examination procedures, patent enforcement, patent infringement, patent search and patent specification drafting. Other subjects such as patent litigation proceedings, patent administrative remedy proceedings, and the introduction of the correlation of the patent law and other Intellectual Property laws are also included.

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論專利申請後的答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practice of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in this class.

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構, 能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在Hadoop生態系統中，以Cloudera Hadoop為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹Hadoop認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度

Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the well-skilled students to complete special projects in research and development through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各20位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

notes: 前9週至北醫上課，後9週於北科上課，大研合開

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。

Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與計算生物學及醫學資訊學相關之重要主題。 學生能夠了解如何正確分析生物和醫學數據所衍伸的問題及應用。 希望透過課程協助同學了解和學習如何組裝基因體資料和醫學數據分析中經常使用的演算法技術內容，閱讀最新相關生醫技術論文及使用開放工具，增進實際操作之經驗或自行建構分析生醫相關資料之應用系統。
description.en: This course is designed to provide important topics in computational biology and medical informatics. Students are able to learn about problems involved in the generation and analysis of biological and medical data. The course intends to provide good understanding of the commonly used algorithms and public tools in the analysis of genomic and medical data, to read updated scientific reports, and to increase hands-on experiences with accessing and using relevant databases.

name.zh: 計算生物學及醫學資訊

description.zh: 分散式系統係指能夠協同工作，並且提供使用者一個整合式運用途徑的一群電腦。分散式系統的探討課題，一般包括作業系統/硬體架構，相關應用，通訊機制，程序管理，命名方式，協同機制，一致性與複製問題與解決方法，容錯特性，以及安全機制。
description.en: A distributed system is usually considered as a collection of collaborating computers that appears as a single coherent system to its users. The fields of distributed system cover many different subjects, including the OS/hardware architectures, applications, communication, processes, naming, coordination, consistency and replication, fault tolerance, and security.

description.zh: 設計思考是一種幫助人們理解與發展解決特定問題的創造性方法，在本課程中，我們將聚焦在如何使用設計思考方法解決聯合國可持續發展目標中所遇到的問題。課程採用教學與工作坊模式，希望能啟發與培養同理心、問題解決能力、溝通與協調能力、透過跨域共創，培育未來跨領域領導人才。
description.en: Design thinking is a methodology that helps people understand and develop creative ways to solve a specific issue.In this course, we will focus on how to use Design thinking method to solving problems in UN SDGs.the course hopes to inspire and teaching students have Empathy, problem solving ability, communication and coordination ability, and foster future cross-disciplinary leaders.

notes: 本課程與北醫許怡欣和楊雅婷教師合開

description.zh: 設計思考是一種幫助人們理解與發展解決特定問題的創造性方法，在本課程中，我們將聚焦在如何使用設計思考方法解決聯合國可持續發展目標中所遇到的問題。課程採用教學與工作坊模式，希望能啟發與培養同理心、問題解決能力、溝通與協調能力、透過跨域共創，培育未來跨領域領導人才。
description.en: Design thinking is a methodology that helps people understand and develop creative ways to solve a specific issue.In this course, we will focus on how to use Design thinking method to solving problems in UN SDGs.the course hopes to inspire and teaching students have Empathy, problem solving ability, communication and coordination ability, and foster future cross-disciplinary leaders.

name.zh: 設計思考-設計與永續發展

notes: 本課程與北醫許怡欣和楊雅婷教師合開，課程配合USR

description.zh: 本課程講解衛星的電機系統，包括指令與資料處理、電力、通訊、飛行軟體及電機介面等，並以國內衛星的實例說明發展程序。建議先修電子學或電子電路相關課程。
description.en: This course introduces the satellite electrical systems, including instructions and data processing, power, communications, flight software, and electrical interfaces. This course also uses the example of domestic satellite systems to illustrate the development procedures. It is recommended that students have taken courses related to Electronics or Electronic Circuits.

notes: 收播遠距教學,18:30~21:20上課,綜科216B,清大林信嘉

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用於管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析。本課程內容包含複迴歸分析、因素分析、主成份分析、區別分析、多變量變異數分析、典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、結構方程式模式。
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze multiple variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting, and so on. This scope of course includes Multiple Regression Analysis, Principal Component Analysis, Factor Analysis, Discriminate Analysis, Multiple Analysis of Variance, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Cluster Analysis, and Structural Equation Modeling.

description.zh: 行銷英文是為商業人士及學習商業英語的學生而安排的一種多位階的商業英文課程。課程教本已經與世界領先企業資源之一的美國"經濟時代"期刊合作完成。課程單元都是為了讓學生具備好的工具和應用技巧以便他們可以在國際企業和行銷上有成功的表現而設計。課程結束後，學生將有能力在全面的商業環境下用英文去充分的溝通;能夠在商業的世界中去發揮他們的知識，更流利而且有自信的運用商業語言，進而增加他們服務公司的繁榮與發展。
description.en: Marketing English is a multi-level business English course for businesspeople and students of business English. The course book has been developed in association with the Financial Times, one of the leading sources of business information in the world. The units are designed to equip students with the tools and skills they need to succeed in marketing and international business. At the end of this course, students will be able to communicate in English in a wide range of business situations; they will also enlarge their knowledge of the business world; and they will be more fluent and confident in using the language of business and should increase their companies’ prospects.

notes: 不計入畢業學分/英文能力畢業標準

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生創新創業的實務，讓學生實際組成團隊進行創業，並有老師全程指導實踐創業，學校並提供基本創業基金與創業場地，輔導學生實際體會創業的過程。課程內容包括：創新創業精神、創新思考、自我了解、團隊組成、經營模式建立、創業財務、創業專題進行、創業競賽等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

name.en: Entrepreneurship Practices: The Apprentice in NTUT

notes: 0週;和經管三、經管所合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程以簡要方式介紹我國專利法，內容主要涵蓋：專利申請、可專利標的、專利要件、專利審查流程、專利權之實施、專利侵害判斷、專利檢索及專利說明書之撰寫，尚包括專利訴訟流程、專利行政救濟流程以及專利法與其他智慧財產權法關係之簡介。
description.en: This course briefly introduces the patent law of our country, which covers the filing of the patent application, patentable subject matter, patentability, patent examination procedures, patent enforcement, patent infringement, patent search and patent specification drafting. Other subjects such as patent litigation proceedings, patent administrative remedy proceedings, and the introduction of the correlation of the patent law and other Intellectual Property laws are also included.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在探討及分析各種先進通訊技術，相關領域包括新世代無線通訊、電信網路、多媒體訊號處理等
description.en: This course aims to explore and analyze various advanced communication technologies related to areas of new generation wireless .communications, telecommunication networks, and multimedia signal processing, and so on.

name.en: Advanced special topics on communication engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.
